*             GEN REFS(PCBPTR,PCBFQPA) SETS(PCBPTR);               0733 02565000
@RF00724 DS    0H                                                  0733 02566000
        ICM   PCBPTR,@07,PCBFQPA(PCBPTR)  GO CHECK THE NEXT PCB         02567000
*         END;                      /* END OF PCB CHAIN              */ 02568000
@DE00722 LTR   PCBPTR,PCBPTR                                       0734 02569000
         BNZ   @DL00722                                            0734 02570000
*         CALLTERM='1'B;            /* IF THE PCB CANNOT BE FOUND, 0735 02571000
*                                      SET BIT TO INDICATE THAT THE     02572000
*                                      MEMORY MUST BE TERMINATED WHEN   02573000
*                                      ALL THE FIX COUNTS HAVE BEEN     02574000
*                                      ADJUSTED                      */ 02575000
         OI    CALLTERM(PCBRPTR),B'01000000'                       0735 02576000
*         RCARCRD='13'X;            /* SET REASON CODE               */ 02577000

*         CALL SWAPC0D;             /* RECORD ERROR VIA THE FRR    0737 02580000

         BAL   @14,SWAPC0D                                         0737 02582000
*       END;                        /* END PRIVATE AREA PROCESSING   */ 02583000
*                                                                  0738 02584000
*     /***************************************************************/ 02585000
*     /*                                                             */ 02586000
*     /* DECREMENT COUNT OF ENTRIES TO BE PROCESSED AND SET SWAPPTR  */ 02587000
*     /* TO POINT TO NEXT FIX ENTRY                                  */ 02588000
*     /*                                                             */ 02589000
*     /***************************************************************/ 02590000
*                                                                  0739 02591000
*SWAPCOMM:                                                         0739 02592000
*     START=START-1;                /* SUBTRACT 1 FROM COUNT         */ 02593000
@RC00647 DS    0H                                                  0739 02594000
SWAPCOMM BCTR  START,0                                             0739 02595000
*     SWAPPTR=SWAPPTR+LENGTH(SPCTSWPE);/* ADD LENGTH OF A FIX ENTRY  */ 02596000
         AL    SWAPPTR,@CF00055                                    0740 02597000
*   END;                            /* END OF FIX ENTRIES            */ 02598000
@DE00639 LTR   START,START                                         0741 02599000
         BNZ   @DL00639                                            0741 02600000
*   RFY                                                            0742 02601000
*    (START,                                                       0742 02602000
*     FINISH,                                                      0742 02603000
*     SWAPPTR) UNRSTD;                                             0742 02604000
*   SPCTBIG='0'B;                   /* TURN OFF BIG FIX BIT          */ 02605000
         NI    SPCTBIG(SPCTPTR),B'11101111'                        0743 02606000
*   IF CALLTERM='1'B THEN           /* IF AN ERROR WAS FOUND IN THIS    02607000
*                                      PROCESS                       */ 02608000
         TM    CALLTERM(PCBRPTR),B'01000000'                       0744 02609000
         BNO   @RF00744                                            0744 02610000
*     PCBRFAIL='1'B;                /* SET BIT TO TERMINATE THE    0745 02611000
*                                      MEMORY                        */ 02612000
         OI    PCBRFAIL(PCBRPTR),B'00001000'                       0745 02613000
*   RFY                                                            0746 02614000
*     R14 RSTD;                                                    0746 02615000

*   R14=PCBRSAVE;                   /* RESTORE RETURN REGISTER       */ 02617000
         L     R14,PCBRSAVE-1(,PCBRPTR)                            0747 02618000
         LA    R14,0(,R14)                                         0747 02619000
*   GOTO R14;                       /* EXIT                          */ 02620000
         BR    R14                                                 0748 02621000
*FIX:                               /* END SWAPFIX                   */ 02622000
*   END SWAPFIX;                                                   0749 02623000
@EL00004 DS    0H                                                  0749 02624000
@EF00004 DS    0H                                                  0749 02625000
@ER00004 BR    @14                                                 0749 02626000
*                                                                  0750 02627000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02628000
*   /*                                                               */ 02629000
*   /* THIS IS AN INTERNAL SUBROUTINE WHICH PROVIDES A COMMON POINT  */ 02630000
*   /* IN SWAP-IN PROCESSING TO CALL RTM WITH A MEMTERM REQUEST FOR  */ 02631000
*   /* THE ADDRESS SPACE BEING BROUGHT IN. THE CALLER MUST SET THE   */ 02632000
*   /* ASID IN REGISTER 2 BEFORE INVOKING THIS ROUTINE.              */ 02633000
*   /*                                                               */ 02634000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02635000
*                                                                  0750 02636000
*SWAPRTM:                                                          0750 02637000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               0750 02638000
SWAPRTM  DS    0H                                                  0751 02639000
*   RFY                                                            0751 02640000
*    (R1,                                                          0751 02641000
*     R7,                                                          0751 02642000
*     R13,                                                         0751 02643000
*     R14) RSTD;                                                   0751 02644000
*   R7=R14;                         /* SAVE RETURN ADDRESS           */ 02645000
         LR    R7,R14                                              0752 02646000
*   R1='028'X;                      /* SET COMPLETION CODE           */ 02647000
         LA    R1,40                                               0753 02648000
*   R13=ADDR(PVTSAVE);              /* PASS SAVE AREA IN PVT         */ 02649000
         LA    R13,PVTSAVE(,PVTPTR)                                0754 02650000
*   GEN REFS(R1,CVTBTERM,CVTMAP) SETS(R0,R1,R14,R15);              0755 02651000
        CALLRTM TYPE=MEMTERM,COMPCOD=(1),ASID=(2)  CALL RTM             02652000
*   GOTO R7;                        /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 02653000
         BR    R7                                                  0756 02654000
*   RFY                                                            0757 02655000
*    (R1,                                                          0757 02656000
*     R7,                                                          0757 02657000
*     R13,                                                         0757 02658000
*     R14) UNRSTD;                                                 0757 02659000
*RTM:                                                              0758 02660000
*   END SWAPRTM;                    /* END SWAPRTM                   */ 02661000
@EL00005 DS    0H                                                  0758 02662000
@EF00005 DS    0H                                                  0758 02663000
@ER00005 BR    @14                                                 0758 02664000
*                                                                  0759 02665000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02666000
*   /*                                                               */ 02667000
*   /* THIS ROUTINE IS SCHEDULED BY THE SWAP IN ROOT EXIT TO POST RCT*/ 02668000
*   /* IN THE MEMORY BEING SWAPPED IN. XMPOST CANNOT BE USED BECAUSE */ 02669000
*   /* OF RECURSION PROBLEMS WITH THE SALLOC LOCK            @VS08619*/ 02670000
*   /*                                                               */ 02671000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02672000
*                                                                  0759 02673000
*IEAVSWPP:                          /*                       @Z40WPYC*/ 02674000
*   GEN REFS(R15) SETS(R9);                                        0759 02675000
IEAVSWPP DS    0H                                                  0759 02676000
*                                /*  @Z40WPYC*/                         02677000
        ENTRY IEAVSWPP               @Z40WPYC                           02678000
        LA     R15,SWINPST-@PSTART  GET OFFSET START  @Z40WPYC          02679000
        BALR   R9,@00               EST. ADDRESSABILITY @Z40WPYC        02680000
SWINPST SR     R9,R15               ADJUST BY PROPER OFFSET @Z40WPYC    02681000
*   PVTPTR=CVTPVTP;                 /* OBTAIN PVT ADDRESS    @VS08619*/ 02682000
*                                                                  0760 02683000
         L     @14,CVTPTR                                          0760 02684000
         L     PVTPTR,CVTPVTP(,@14)                                0760 02685000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02686000
*   /*                                                               */ 02687000
*   /* THIS SUBROUTINE FREES THE SRB AREA ADDRESSED BY REGISTER ZERO */ 02688000
*   /* WHEN THE ROUTINE IS ENTERED.                                  */ 02689000
*   /*                                                               */ 02690000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02691000
*                                                                  0761 02692000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0761 02693000
*    (R0,                                                          0761 02694000
*     R1,                                                          0761 02695000
*     R7,                                                          0761 02696000
*     PCBPTR) RESTRICTED;           /*                       @Z40WPYC*/ 02697000
*   R7=R1;                          /* SAVE ADDRESS OF P.A. UNFIXED     02698000
*                                      PCB'S                 @Z40WPYC*/ 02699000
         LR    R7,R1                                               0762 02700000
*   R1=R0;                          /* PUT THE SRB ADDRESS IN R1   0763 02701000
*                                                            @VS08619*/ 02702000
         LR    R1,R0                                               0763 02703000
*   R0=PVTSRBID;                    /* PUT THE CELL POOL ID IN R0  0764 02704000
*                                                            @VS08619*/ 02705000
         L     R0,PVTSRBID(,PVTPTR)                                0764 02706000
*   GEN REFS(CVTPTR,CVTFRECL,CVTMAP,R13) SETS(R14,R15);            0765 02707000
*                                                        /* @VS08619*/  02708000
         FREECELL CPID=(0),CELL=(1),BRANCH=YES,SAVE=NO                  02709000
*   PVTPTR=CVTPVTP;                 /* RESET PVT ADDRESS     @VS08619*/ 02710000
         L     @14,CVTPTR                                          0766 02711000
         L     PVTPTR,CVTPVTP(,@14)                                0766 02712000
*   RFY                                                            0767 02713000
*     ASCB BASED(PSAAOLD);          /* SET BASE TO ASCB              */ 02714000
*   RFY                                                            0768 02715000
*    (R8,                                                          0768 02716000
*     R11,                                                         0768 02717000
*     R12) RSTD;                                                   0768 02718000
*                                                                  0768 02719000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02720000
*   /*                                                               */ 02721000
*   /* ESTABLISH THE FRR ROUTINE TO RECORD ANY ERRORS                */ 02722000
*   /*                                                               */ 02723000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02724000
*                                                                  0769 02725000
*   GEN CODE REFS(PSACSTK,PSA,FRRS,PVTPTR,PVTPRCV,FRRSCURR,FRRSLAST,    02726000
*       PSALSFCC,FRRSELEN,FRRSFRRA,FRRSENTR,FRRSPARM) SETS(R11,R12,R8); 02727000
         SETFRR A,FRRAD=PVTPRCV(PVTPTR),PARMAD=(R8),                  **02728000
               WRKREGS=(R11,R12)                                        02729000
*   RFY                                                            0770 02730000
*     RCA BASED(R8);                                               0770 02731000
*   RCACSECT=RCACSPIN;              /* SET MODULE ID IN RCA          */ 02732000
         MVI   RCACSECT(R8),X'19'                                  0771 02733000
*   RCARETAD=ADDR(SWPPRTRY);        /* SET RETRY ADDRES      @Z40WPYC*/ 02734000
         LA    @14,SWPPRTRY                                        0772 02735000
         ST    @14,RCARETAD(,R8)                                   0772 02736000
*   RCASWPP='1'B;                   /* INDICATE IEAVSWPP     @Z40WPYC*/ 02737000
         OI    RCASWPP(R8),B'00000100'                             0773 02738000
*   RSMHDPTR=ASCBRSM;               /* LOCATE RSMHD PTR      @Z40WPYC*/ 02739000
         L     @14,PSAAOLD                                         0774 02740000
         L     RSMHDPTR,ASCBRSM(,@14)                              0774 02741000
*   IF R7¬=0 THEN                   /* IF STAGE2 PCB'S       @Z40WPYC*/ 02742000
         LTR   R7,R7                                               0775 02743000
         BZ    @RF00775                                            0775 02744000
*     DO;                           /* SET UP TO ALLOCATE FRAMES   0776 02745000
*                                                            @Z40WPYC*/ 02746000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0777 02747000
*        (R13,                                                     0777 02748000
*         R14) RESTRICTED;          /*                       @Z40WPYC*/ 02749000
*                                                                  0777 02750000
*       /*************************************************************/ 02751000
*       /*                                                           */ 02752000
*       /* REQUEST SALLOC UNCONDITIONALLY                    @Z40WPYC*/ 02753000
*       /*                                                           */ 02754000
*       /*************************************************************/ 02755000
*                                                                  0778 02756000
*GETLOCK2:                                                         0778 02757000
*       GEN CODE REFS(PSALITA,FLC) SETS(R11,R12,R13,R14);          0778 02758000
GETLOCK2 DS    0H                                                  0778 02759000
*                                                        /* @Z40WPYC*/  02760000
         SETLOCK OBTAIN,TYPE=SALLOC,MODE=UNCOND,                      **02761000
               RELATED=(RSM,IEAVSWPP(FREELCK2))                         02762000
*       PVTPRCA=R8;                 /* SAVE ADDRESS OF RCA   @Z40WPYC*/ 02763000
         ST    R8,PVTPRCA(,PVTPTR)                                 0779 02764000
*       RCASAL='1'B;                /* INDICATE SALLOC HELD  @Z40WPYC*/ 02765000
         OI    RCASAL(R8),B'10000000'                              0780 02766000
*       PCBPTR=R7;                  /* SET PTR TO FIRST PCB  @Z40WPYC*/ 02767000
         LR    PCBPTR,R7                                           0781 02768000
*       DO WHILE PCBPTR¬=0;         /* PROCESS STAGE2 PCB'S  @Z40WPYC*/ 02769000
         B     @DE00782                                            0782 02770000
@DL00782 DS    0H                                                  0783 02771000
*         R1=PCBVBN*256;            /* SET INPUT VSA FOR IEAVFP2   0783 02772000
*                                                            @Z40WPYC*/ 02773000
         LH    R1,PCBVBN(,PCBPTR)                                  0783 02774000
         N     R1,@CF02051                                         0783 02775000
         SLA   R1,8                                                0783 02776000
*         CALL FINDPAGE;            /* CALL IEAVFP2 TO OBTAIN THE  0784 02777000
*                                      PGTE AND XPTE ADDRESSES.    0784 02778000
*                                                            @Z40WPYC*/ 02779000
         L     @15,PVTPFP2(,PVTPTR)                                0784 02780000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0784 02781000
*         PTEPTR=R0;                /* POINT TO PAGE TABLE   @Z40WPYC*/ 02782000
         LR    PTEPTR,R0                                           0785 02783000
*         IF R15¬=0|PGTPVM='0'B|PGTPAM='0'B THEN/* IF PAGE TABLE HAS    02784000
*                                      BEEN FREEMAIND OR PAGE DOES 0786 02785000
*                                      NOT REQUIRE I/O, THEN ...   0786 02786000
*                                                            @Z40WPYC*/ 02787000
         LTR   R15,R15                                             0786 02788000
         BNZ   @RT00786                                            0786 02789000
         TM    PGTPVM(PTEPTR),B'00001001'                          0786 02790000
         BO    @RF00786                                            0786 02791000
@RT00786 DS    0H                                                  0787 02792000
*           DO;                     /* REMOVE PCB FROM QUEUE @Z40WPYC*/ 02793000
*             IF PCBBQPA¬=0 THEN    /* NOT FIRST PCB         @Z40WPYC*/ 02794000
         L     @10,PCBBQPA(,PCBPTR)                                0788 02795000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0788 02796000
         BZ    @RF00788                                            0788 02797000
*               PCBBQPA->PCBFQPA=PCBFQPA;/* CHAIN PREVIOUS TO NEW  0789 02798000
*                                      NEXT                  @Z40WPYC*/ 02799000
         MVC   PCBFQPA(3,@10),PCBFQPA(PCBPTR)                      0789 02800000
*             ELSE                  /* FIRST PCB             @Z40WPYC*/ 02801000
*               R7=PCBFQPA;         /* ESTABLISH NEW HEAD    @Z40WPYC*/ 02802000
         B     @RC00788                                            0790 02803000
@RF00788 L     R7,PCBFQPA-1(,PCBPTR)                               0790 02804000
         LA    R7,0(,R7)                                           0790 02805000
*             IF PCBFQPA¬=0 THEN    /* MORE PCB'S            @Z40WPYC*/ 02806000
@RC00788 L     @10,PCBFQPA-1(,PCBPTR)                              0791 02807000
         LA    @10,0(,@10)                                         0791 02808000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0791 02809000
         BZ    @RF00791                                            0791 02810000
*               PCBFQPA->PCBBQPA=PCBBQPA;/* BACK CHAIN THE NEXT TO 0792 02811000
*                                      THE PREVIOUS          @Z40WPYC*/ 02812000
         MVC   PCBBQPA(4,@10),PCBBQPA(PCBPTR)                      0792 02813000
*             ELSE                                                 0793 02814000
*               ;                   /* LAST PCB              @Z40WPYC*/ 02815000
@RF00791 DS    0H                                                  0794 02816000
*             R1=PCBPTR;            /* SET PCB ADDR          @Z40WPYC*/ 02817000
         LR    R1,PCBPTR                                           0794 02818000
*             PCBPTR=PCBFQPA;       /* SET PTR TO NEXT PCB   @Z40WPYC*/ 02819000
         L     @10,PCBFQPA-1(,PCBPTR)                              0795 02820000
         LA    @10,0(,@10)                                         0795 02821000
         LR    PCBPTR,@10                                          0795 02822000
*             R1->PCBFQPA=0;        /* CLEAR FORWARD PTR OF PCB TO BE   02823000
*                                      DEQUEUED              @Z40WPYC*/ 02824000
         SLR   @10,@10                                             0796 02825000
         STCM  @10,7,PCBFQPA(R1)                                   0796 02826000
*             R1->PCBBQPA=0;        /* CLEAR BACK PTR OF PCB TO BE 0797 02827000
*                                      DEQUEUED              @Z40WPYC*/ 02828000
         ST    @10,PCBBQPA(,R1)                                    0797 02829000
*             R0=PCBFREQN;          /* INDICATE PCB TO FREE Q      0798 02830000
*                                                            @Z40WPYC*/ 02831000
         LA    R0,16                                               0798 02832000
*             CALL PCBMGR;          /* PCB TO FREE QUEUE     @Z40WPYC*/ 02833000
         L     @15,PVTPCB(,PVTPTR)                                 0799 02834000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0799 02835000
*           END;                    /* END IN CORE PROCESSING      0800 02836000
*                                                            @Z40WPYC*/ 02837000
*         ELSE                      /* OUT OF CORE PCB       @Z40WPYC*/ 02838000
*           DO;                     /* INIT PGTE AND XPTE IN PCB   0801 02839000
*                                                            @Z40WPYC*/ 02840000
         B     @RC00786                                            0801 02841000
@RF00786 DS    0H                                                  0802 02842000
*             PCBXPTA=R1;           /* STORE XPTE ADDRESS    @Z40WPYC*/ 02843000
         STCM  R1,7,PCBXPTA(PCBPTR)                                0802 02844000
*             PCBPGTA=R0;           /* STORE PGTE ADDRESS    @Z40WPYC*/ 02845000
         STCM  R0,7,PCBPGTA(PCBPTR)                                0803 02846000
*             PCBPTR=PCBFQPA;       /* SET PTR TO NEXT PCB   @Z40WPYC*/ 02847000
         L     @10,PCBFQPA-1(,PCBPTR)                              0804 02848000
         LA    @10,0(,@10)                                         0804 02849000
         LR    PCBPTR,@10                                          0804 02850000
*           END;                    /* END OUT OF CORE PROCESSING  0805 02851000
*                                                            @Z40WPYC*/ 02852000
*       END;                        /* END CHECK PGTPVM      @Z40WPYC*/ 02853000
@RC00786 DS    0H                                                  0806 02854000
@DE00782 SLR   @10,@10                                             0806 02855000
         CR    PCBPTR,@10                                          0806 02856000
         BNE   @DL00782                                            0806 02857000
*       IF R7¬=0 THEN               /* IF STAGE2 SWAPPING REQUIRED 0807 02858000
*                                                            @Z40WPYC*/ 02859000
         CR    R7,@10                                              0807 02860000
         BE    @RF00807                                            0807 02861000
*         DO;                       /* INITIATE THE STAGE2 SWAPIN  0808 02862000
*                                                            @Z40WPYC*/ 02863000
*                                                                  0808 02864000
*           /*********************************************************/ 02865000
*           /*                                                       */ 02866000
*           /* PASS THE CHAIN OF PRIVATE AREA UNFIXED PCB'S TO GFA TO*/ 02867000
*           /* HAVE THE FRAMES ASSIGNED AND THE I/O INITIATED        */ 02868000
*           /*                                               @Z40WPYC*/ 02869000
*           /*                                                       */ 02870000
*           /*********************************************************/ 02871000
*                                                                  0809 02872000
*           R1=R7;                  /* POINT TO FIRST PRIVATE AREA 0809 02873000
*                                      PCB                   @Z40WPYC*/ 02874000
         LR    R1,R7                                               0809 02875000
*           R2=PSAAOLD->ASCBRSM;    /* GET CURRENT RSMHD PTR @Z40WPYC*/ 02876000
         L     @10,PSAAOLD                                         0810 02877000
         L     R2,ASCBRSM(,@10)                                    0810 02878000
*           CALL GFA;               /* CALL GENERAL FRAME ALLOCATION    02879000
*                                                            @Z40WPYC*/ 02880000
         L     @15,PVTPGFA(,PVTPTR)                                0811 02881000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0811 02882000
*           RCACSECT=RCACSPIN;      /* RESET MODULE ID       @Z40WPYC*/ 02883000
         MVI   RCACSECT(R8),X'19'                                  0812 02884000
*         END;                      /* END GFA PROCESSING    @Z40WPYC*/ 02885000
*       ELSE                                                       0814 02886000
*         ;                         /* NO STAGE2 PCBS REQUIRING I/O     02887000
*                                                            @Z40WPYC*/ 02888000
@RF00807 DS    0H                                                  0815 02889000
*FREELCK2:                                                         0815 02890000
*       GEN CODE REFS(PSALITA,FLC) SETS(R11,R12,R13,R14);          0815 02891000
FREELCK2 DS    0H                                                  0815 02892000
         SETLOCK RELEASE,TYPE=SALLOC,RELATED=(RSM,IEAVSWPP(GETLOCK2))   02893000
*       RCASAL='0'B;                /* NO LONGER HOLD SALLOC @Z40WPYC*/ 02894000
         NI    RCASAL(R8),B'01111111'                              0816 02895000
*     END;                          /* END STAGE2 PROCESSING @Z40WPYC*/ 02896000
*   ELSE                                                           0818 02897000
*     ;                             /* NO STAGE2 PCBS TO PROCESS   0818 02898000
*                                                            @Z40WPYC*/ 02899000
*                                                                  0818 02900000
@RF00775 DS    0H                                                  0819 02901000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02902000
*   /*                                                               */ 02903000
*   /* OBTAIN THE LOCAL LOCK TO POST RCT                             */ 02904000
*   /*                                                               */ 02905000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02906000
*                                                                  0819 02907000
*SWPPRTRY:                          /* FRR RETRY ADDR        @Z40WPYC*/ 02908000
*   GEN CODE REFS(PSALITA,FLC) DEFS(SIRTGET) SETS(R11,R12,R13,R14);     02909000
SWPPRTRY DS    0H                                                  0819 02910000
SIRTGET  SETLOCK OBTAIN,TYPE=LOCAL,MODE=UNCOND,                       **02911000
               RELATED=(PSTRCT,IEAVSWIN(SIRTFREE))                      02912000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0820 02913000
*    (R10) RESTRICTED;                                             0820 02914000
*   RCALL='1'B;                     /* INDICATE LOCAL LOCK OBTAINED     02915000
*                                                            @Z40WPYC*/ 02916000
         OI    RCALL(R8),B'01000000'                               0821 02917000
*   R10=0;                          /* SET POST CODE FOR POST OF RCT.   02918000
*                                                            @VS08619*/ 02919000
         SLR   R10,R10                                             0822 02920000
*   R11=ADDR(ASCBQECB);             /* GET THE ADDRESS OF RCT QUIESCE   02921000
*                                      ECB FOR THE POST.     @VS08619*/ 02922000
         L     R11,PSAAOLD                                         0823 02923000
         LA    R11,ASCBQECB(,R11)                                  0823 02924000
*   CALL POSTRCT;                   /* BRANCH ENTER POST TO POST THE    02925000
*                                      QUIESCE ECB           @VS08619*/ 02926000
         L     @15,CVTPTR                                          0824 02927000
         L     @15,CVT0PT02(,@15)                                  0824 02928000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0824 02929000
*   GENERATE CODE;                                                 0825 02930000
SIRTFREE SETLOCK RELEASE,TYPE=LOCAL,                                  **02931000
               RELATED=(POSTRCT,IEAVSWIN(SIRTGET))                      02932000
         SETFRR D,WRKREGS=(R11,R12)                                     02933000
*   R14=CVTSRBRT;                   /* GET THE DISPATCHER RETURN   0826 02934000
*                                      ADDRESS.              @VS08619*/ 02935000
         L     R14,CVTPTR                                          0826 02936000
         L     R14,CVTSRBRT(,R14)                                  0826 02937000
*   GOTO R14;                       /* RETURN TO CALLER      @VS08619*/ 02938000
         BR    R14                                                 0827 02939000
*   RFY                                                            0828 02940000
*    (R0,                                                          0828 02941000
*     R1,                                                          0828 02942000
*     R8,                                                          0828 02943000
*     R10,                                                         0828 02944000
*     R11,                                                         0828 02945000
*     R12,                                                         0828 02946000
*     R13,                                                         0828 02947000
*     R7) UNRESTRICTED;             /*                       @Z40WPYC*/ 02948000
*   RFY                                                            0829 02949000
*     ASCB BASED(PCBRASCB);                                        0829 02950000
*SWIN:                                                             0830 02951000
*   END IEAVSWIN                    /* END SWAP IN                   */ 02952000

*                                                                  0830 02973000
*       ;                                                          0830 02974000
SWIN     DS    0H                                                  0830 02975000
@DATA    DS    0H                                                       02976000
@CH00224 DC    H'5'                                                     02977000
         DS    0F                                                       02978000
         DS    0F                                                       02979000
@CF00062 DC    F'1'                                                     02980000
@CF00925 DC    F'6'                                                     02981000
@CH00925 EQU   @CF00925+2                                               02982000
@CF00055 DC    F'8'                                                     02983000
@CF00052 DC    F'15'                                                    02984000
@CF01288 DC    F'56'                                                    02985000
@CF01927 DC    XL4'FF000000'                                            02986000
@CF02051 DC    XL4'0000FFFF'                                            02987000
@CF01961 DC    XL4'7FFF'                                                02988000
         DS    0D                                                       02989000
@CC01994 DC    C'SRB '                                                  02990000
@00      EQU   00                      EQUATES FOR REGISTERS 0-15       02991000
@01      EQU   01                                                       02992000
@02      EQU   02                                                       02993000
@03      EQU   03                                                       02994000
@04      EQU   04                                                       02995000
@05      EQU   05                                                       02996000
@06      EQU   06                                                       02997000
@07      EQU   07                                                       02998000
@08      EQU   08                                                       02999000
@09      EQU   09                                                       03000000
@10      EQU   10                                                       03001000
@11      EQU   11                                                       03002000
@12      EQU   12                                                       03003000
@13      EQU   13                                                       03004000
@14      EQU   14                                                       03005000
@15      EQU   15                                                       03006000
ASCBPTR  EQU   @07                                                      03007000
PCBPTR   EQU   @05                                                      03008000
PCBRPTR  EQU   @06                                                      03009000
PFTEPTR  EQU   @14                                                      03010000
PTEPTR   EQU   @14                                                      03011000
PVTPTR   EQU   @03                                                      03012000
RSMHDPTR EQU   @02                                                      03013000

@RF00207 EQU   @RC00196                                                 04786000
@RT00211 EQU   SWINCOM1                                                 04787000
@RT00357 EQU   SWINGFA                                                  04788000

@ENDDATA EQU   *                                                        04808000
         END   IEAVSWIN,(C'PLS2104',0701,78164)                         04809000
./  ADD  SSI=60900067,NAME=IEAVSWPC
         TITLE 'IEAVSWPC - SWAPOUT COMPLETION ROUTINE                  *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IEAVSWPC CSECT                                                          00003000
         USING *,R15                                                    00004000
         MODID                                                          00005000
         L     R15,CVTPTR         GET CVT ADDRESS                       00006000
         L     R15,CVTPVTP(R15)   GET PVT ADDRESS                       00007000
         STM   R1,R14,PVTWSA18+12(R15) SAVE CALLER'S REGISTERS IN PVT   00008000
         DROP  R15                                                      00009000
BASE1    BALR  BASEREG,0   ESTABLISH BASE REGISTER                      00010000
         DS    0H                                                       00011000
         USING *,BASEREG                                                00012000
*   PVTPTR=CVTPVTP;                 /* GET ADDRESS OF PVT            */ 00013000
         L     @15,CVTPTR                                          0092 00014000
         L     PVTPTR,CVTPVTP(,@15)                                0092 00015000
*   RTNCODE=R0;                     /* SAVE RETURN CODE FROM ASM     */ 00016000
         LR    RTNCODE,R0                                          0093 00017000
*   AIAPTR=R1;                      /* SAVE INPUT AIA POINTER        */ 00018000
         LR    AIAPTR,R1                                           0094 00019000
*ESTFRR:                                                           0095 00020000
*   GENERATE NODEFS REFS(PSACSTK,PSACSTK,FRRSCURR,PVTPTR,FRRSLAST, 0095 00021000
*       FRRSELEN,FRRSENTR,FRRSFRRA,FRRSPARM,PVTPRCV) SETS(R4,R5,RCAPTR) 00022000
*       NOFLOWS;                                                   0095 00023000
ESTFRR   DS    0H                                                  0095 00024000
  SETFRR A,FRRAD=PVTPRCV(PVTPTR),PARMAD=(RCAPTR),WRKREGS=(R4,R5),     **00025000
                RELATED=(RSM,IEAVSWPC(DELTEFRR))                        00026000
*   RCACSECT=RCACSWPC;              /* SET CSECT ID FOR SWPC         */ 00027000
         MVI   RCACSECT(RCAPTR),X'12'                              0096 00028000
*   RCASWPC=ON;                     /* SET MODULE ENTERED BIT        */ 00029000
         OI    RCASWPC(RCAPTR),B'00000010'                         0097 00030000
*   PVTPRCA=RCAPTR;                 /* STORE ADDRESS OF RCA          */ 00031000
         ST    RCAPTR,PVTPRCA(,PVTPTR)                             0098 00032000
*   PCBPTR=AIAPTR-(LENGTH(PCB)-LENGTH(PCBAIA));/* CALCULATE THE PCB     00033000
*                                      ADDRESS                       */ 00034000
         LR    PCBPTR,AIAPTR                                       0099 00035000
         SL    PCBPTR,@CF02181                                     0099 00036000
*   RCAPARM0=PCBPTR;                /* SAVE THE ADDRESS OF THE INPUT    00037000
*                                      PCB IN CASE OF AN ERROR       */ 00038000
         ST    PCBPTR,RCAPARM0(,RCAPTR)                            0100 00039000
*   RCARETAD=ADDR(SWPCEFRR);        /* SET ADDRESS TO WHICH THE FRR     00040000
*                                      WILL GIVE CONTROL             */ 00041000
         LA    @15,SWPCEFRR                                        0101 00042000
         ST    @15,RCARETAD(,RCAPTR)                               0101 00043000
*   RSMHDPTR=PCBASCB->ASCBRSM;      /* GET RSM HEADER ADDRESS        */ 00044000
         L     @15,PCBASCB(,PCBPTR)                                0102 00045000
         L     RSMHDPTR,ASCBRSM(,@15)                              0102 00046000
*   RFY                                                            0103 00047000
*     SOUTPARM BASED(SOUTPPTR);                                    0103 00048000
*   SPCTPTR=RSMSPCT;                /* GET SPCT PTR                  */ 00049000
         L     SPCTPTR,RSMSPCT(,RSMHDPTR)                          0104 00050000
*   RFY                                                            0105 00051000
*     SOUTPPTR RSTD;                                               0105 00052000
*   SOUTPPTR=SPCTSWRT;              /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE SPECIAL   00053000
*                                      PCB CONTAINING THE SRM      0106 00054000
*                                      PARAMETER LIST                */ 00055000
         L     SOUTPPTR,SPCTSWRT(,SPCTPTR)                         0106 00056000
*   IF SPCTPURG=ON THEN             /* WAS PAGING PURGED DURING SWAP    00057000
*                                      OUT?                          */ 00058000
*                                                                  0107 00059000
         TM    SPCTPURG(SPCTPTR),B'00100000'                       0107 00060000
         BNO   @RF00107                                            0107 00061000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00062000
*     /*                                                             */ 00063000
*     /* NOTE THAT BIT IS SET BY SWAP OUT WHEN THE ROOT COUNT IS     */ 00064000
*     /* DECREMENTED TO ZERO OR WHEN RESET IS CALLED                 */ 00065000
*     /*                                                             */ 00066000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00067000
*                                                                  0108 00068000
*     OPTWAIT=ON;                   /* YES, INDICATE TO THE SRM THAT    00069000
*                                      THERE IS WORK AVAILABLE IN  0108 00070000
*                                      THIS ADDRESS SPACE            */ 00071000
         OI    OPTWAIT(SOUTPPTR),B'00000001'                       0108 00072000
*   IF AIAPAGDS=ON THEN             /* WERE THE LSQA PAGES ALLOCATED    00073000
*                                      TO A SWAP SET DATA SET;       */ 00074000
@RF00107 TM    AIAPAGDS(AIAPTR),B'00000100'                        0109 00075000
         BNO   @RF00109                                            0109 00076000
*     SPCTPSET=ON;                  /* YES, INDICATE SO IN SPCT      */ 00077000
         OI    SPCTPSET(SPCTPTR),B'00001000'                       0110 00078000
*   R1=ZERO;                        /* INDICATE TO IEAVINV TO DO   0111 00079000
*                                      PTLB'S ONLY                   */ 00080000
@RF00109 SLR   R1,R1                                               0111 00081000
*   CALL IEAVINV;                   /* CALL INVALIDATE TO ISSUE    0112 00082000
*                                      PTLB'S                        */ 00083000
         L     @15,PVTPINV(,PVTPTR)                                0112 00084000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0112 00085000
*   IF RTNCODE=ZERO THEN            /* WAS SWAP SUCCESSFUL           */ 00086000
         LTR   RTNCODE,RTNCODE                                     0113 00087000
         BNZ   @RF00113                                            0113 00088000
*     DO;                           /* YES, SWAP WAS SUCCESFUL. ZERO    00089000
*                                      RETURN CODE WAS RECEIVED FROM    00090000
*                                      ILRSWAP                       */ 00091000
*       PVTSPOUT=PVTSPOUT+OPTSOUT;  /* INCREMENT THE SWAPOUT COUNT   */ 00092000
         LH    @15,OPTSOUT(,SOUTPPTR)                              0115 00093000
         AL    @15,PVTSPOUT(,PVTPTR)                               0115 00094000
         ST    @15,PVTSPOUT(,PVTPTR)                               0115 00095000
*       R1=ADDR(OPTLIST);           /* SET UP PARMETER FOR SYSEVENT  */ 00096000
         LA    R1,OPTLIST(,SOUTPPTR)                               0116 00097000
*       R0=PCBASCB->ASCBASID;       /* GET ASID OF SWAPPED OUT     0117 00098000
*                                      ADDRESS SPACE                 */ 00099000
         L     @15,PCBASCB(,PCBPTR)                                0117 00100000
         LH    R0,ASCBASID(,@15)                                   0117 00101000
         N     R0,@CF02185                                         0117 00102000
*       R13=ADDR(PVTSAVE);          /* GET SAVE AREA ADDRESS FOR SRM */ 00103000
         LA    R13,PVTSAVE(,PVTPTR)                                0118 00104000
*       GENERATE CODE;                                             0119 00105000
  SYSEVENT  SWOUTCMP,ASID=(0),ENTRY=BRANCH                              00106000
*     END;                          /* END OF INITIAL PROCESSING OF A   00107000
*                                      GOOD RETURN CODE FROM ILRSWAP */ 00108000
*   ELSE                                                           0121 00109000
*     DO;                                                          0121 00110000
*                                                                  0121 00111000
         B     @RC00113                                            0121 00112000
@RF00113 DS    0H                                                  0122 00113000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00114000
*       /*                                                           */ 00115000
*       /* CONTROL FALLS HERE WHEN IEAVSWPC IS ENTERED WITH A        */ 00116000
*       /* NON-ZERO RETURN CODE. A RECORDING ABEND IS ISSUED.        */ 00117000
*       /*                                                           */ 00118000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00119000
*                                                                  0122 00120000
*       RCAPTR=PVTPRCA;             /* GET RCA ADDRESS               */ 00121000
         L     RCAPTR,PVTPRCA(,PVTPTR)                             0122 00122000
*       RCARCRD=HEX1E;              /* SET ERROR REASON CODE         */ 00123000
         MVI   RCARCRD(RCAPTR),X'1E'                               0123 00124000
*       GENERATE CODE NOREFS SETS(R1);                             0124 00125000
  ABEND X'C0D',,,SYSTEM                                                 00126000
*     END;                                                         0125 00127000
*   SPCTPTR=RSMSPCT;                /* GET SPCT ADDRESS              */ 00128000
@RC00113 L     SPCTPTR,RSMSPCT(,RSMHDPTR)                          0126 00129000
*   R1=SPCTSWRT;                    /* GET THE ADDRESS OF SPECIAL PCB   00130000
*                                      CONTAINING THE SRM PARAMETER     00131000
*                                      LIST                          */ 00132000
         L     R1,SPCTSWRT(,SPCTPTR)                               0127 00133000
*   R0=PCBFREQN;                    /* INDICATE TO PCB MANAGER THAT     00134000
*                                      PCB IS TO GO TO THE FREE QUEUE*/ 00135000
         LA    R0,16                                               0128 00136000
*   CALL IEAVPCB;                   /* CALL PCB MANAGER TO SEND    0129 00137000
*                                      SPECIAL PCB TO THE FREE QUEUE */ 00138000
         L     @15,PVTPCB(,PVTPTR)                                 0129 00139000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0129 00140000
*   SPCTSWRT=ZERO;                  /* CLEAR PARMLIST PTR            */ 00141000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0130 00142000
         ST    @15,SPCTSWRT(,SPCTPTR)                              0130 00143000
*   SPCTOUT=OFF;                    /* INDICATE SWAP-OUT IS COMPLETE */ 00144000
         NI    SPCTOUT(SPCTPTR),B'10111111'                        0131 00145000
*   IF RTNCODE=ZERO THEN            /* IS THE SWAP-OUT TO BE FAILED  */ 00146000
         CR    RTNCODE,@15                                         0132 00147000
         BNE   @RF00132                                            0132 00148000
*     DO;                           /* NO, THE SWAP-OUT IS SUCCESSFUL*/ 00149000
*                                                                  0134 00150000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00151000
*       /*                                                           */ 00152000
*       /* THIS SECTION OF CODE FREES THE FRAMES WHICH WERE ALLOCATED*/ 00153000
*       /* TO THE SWAPPED-OUT PAGES BY HAVING PFTE MANAGER PLACE THEM*/ 00154000
*       /* AT THE FRONT OF THE AVAILABLE FRAME QUEUE. THE PCBS USED  */ 00155000
*       /* FOR THE SWAP-OUT ARE RETURNED TO THE FREE QUEUE VIA THE   */ 00156000
*       /* PCB MANAGER. NOTE THAT IT IS ASSUMED THAT ONLY LSQA AIAS  */ 00157000
*       /* ARE ON THE CHAIN.                                         */ 00158000
*       /*                                                           */ 00159000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00160000
*                                                                  0134 00161000
*       NXTAIA=AIAPTR;              /* INITIALIZE NEXT AIA POINTER 0134 00162000
*                                      WITH THE INPUT AIA POINTER    */ 00163000
         LR    NXTAIA,AIAPTR                                       0134 00164000
*FREFMPCB:                                                         0135 00165000
*       ;                                                          0135 00166000
*                                                                  0135 00167000
FREFMPCB DS    0H                                                  0136 00168000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00169000
*       /*                                                           */ 00170000
*       /* BEGINNING OF LOOP FREEING FRAMES AND PCBS                 */ 00171000
*       /*                                                           */ 00172000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00173000
*                                                                  0136 00174000
*       RFY                                                        0136 00175000
*         PFTEPTR RSTD;                                            0136 00176000
*       PFTEPTR=PVTPFTP+PCBRBN;     /* CALCULATE PFTE ADDRESS        */ 00177000
         LH    @15,PCBRBN(,PCBPTR)                                 0137 00178000
         N     @15,@CF02185                                        0137 00179000
         L     PFTEPTR,PVTPFTP(,PVTPTR)                            0137 00180000
         ALR   PFTEPTR,@15                                         0137 00181000
*       PFTPCBSI=OFF;               /* SET PCB DEFINED FLAG OFF IN 0138 00182000
*                                      THE PFTE                      */ 00183000
         NI    PFTPCBSI(PFTEPTR),B'11110111'                       0138 00184000
*       R1=PCBASCB;                 /* GET ASCB ADDRESS              */ 00185000
         L     R1,PCBASCB(,PCBPTR)                                 0139 00186000
*       R0=PCBRBN;                  /* GET RBN                       */ 00187000
         LR    R0,@15                                              0140 00188000
*       R0=R0|CONSPFTE;             /* INDICATE TO PFTE TO PLACE   0141 00189000
*                                      FRAME ON FRONT OF AFQ         */ 00190000
         O     R0,@CF02155                                         0141 00191000
*       RSMCNTFX=RSMCNTFX-1;        /* DECREMENT FIXED FRAME COUNT 0142 00192000
*                                      FOR THIS ADDRESS SPACE      0142 00193000
*                                                            @YA01572*/ 00194000
         LH    @15,RSMCNTFX(,RSMHDPTR)                             0142 00195000
         BCTR  @15,0                                               0142 00196000
         STH   @15,RSMCNTFX(,RSMHDPTR)                             0142 00197000
*       PVTCNTFX=PVTCNTFX-1;        /* DECREMENT SYSTEM COUNT      0143 00198000
*                                                            @7A01572*/ 00199000
         LH    @15,PVTCNTFX(,PVTPTR)                               0143 00200000
         BCTR  @15,0                                               0143 00201000
         STH   @15,PVTCNTFX(,PVTPTR)                               0143 00202000
*       CALL IEAVPFTE;              /* FREE THE FRAME                */ 00203000
         L     @15,PVTPFTE(,PVTPTR)                                0144 00204000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0144 00205000
*       R0=PCBFREQN;                /* GET THE FREE QUEUE ID         */ 00206000
         LA    R0,16                                               0145 00207000
*       R1=PCBPTR;                  /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE PCB TO    00208000
*                                      BE FREED                      */ 00209000
         LR    R1,PCBPTR                                           0146 00210000
*       NXTAIA=NXTAIA->AIANXAIA;    /* GET NEXT AIA POINTER          */ 00211000
         L     NXTAIA,AIANXAIA(,NXTAIA)                            0147 00212000
*       CALL IEAVPCB;               /* FREE THE PCB                  */ 00213000
         L     @15,PVTPCB(,PVTPTR)                                 0148 00214000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0148 00215000
*       IF NXTAIA¬=ZERO THEN        /* IS THERE ANOTHER AIA          */ 00216000
         LTR   NXTAIA,NXTAIA                                       0149 00217000
         BZ    @RF00149                                            0149 00218000
*         DO;                       /* YES                           */ 00219000
*           PCBPTR=NXTAIA-(LENGTH(PCB)-LENGTH(AIA));/* CALCULATE PCB    00220000
*                                      ADDRESS                       */ 00221000
         LR    PCBPTR,NXTAIA                                       0151 00222000
         SL    PCBPTR,@CF02181                                     0151 00223000
*           GOTO FREFMPCB;          /* GO FREE FRAME AND PCB         */ 00224000
         B     FREFMPCB                                            0152 00225000
*         END;                                                     0153 00226000
*                                                                  0153 00227000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00228000
*       /*                                                           */ 00229000
*       /* END OF LOOP FREEING FRAMES AND PCBS                       */ 00230000
*       /*                                                           */ 00231000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00232000
*                                                                  0154 00233000
*       ELSE                                                       0154 00234000
*         ;                                                        0154 00235000
@RF00149 DS    0H                                                  0155 00236000
*     END;                          /* END OF ZERO RETURN CODE     0155 00237000
*                                      PROCESSING                    */ 00238000
*   ELSE                                                           0156 00239000
*     DO;                                                          0156 00240000
*                                                                  0156 00241000
         B     @RC00132                                            0156 00242000
@RF00132 DS    0H                                                  0157 00243000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00244000
*       /*                                                           */ 00245000
*       /* CONTROL FALLS HERE WHEN IEAVSWPC IS ENTERED WITH A        */ 00246000
*       /* NON-ZERO RETURN CODE OR IF A NON-ZERO RETURN CODE WAS     */ 00247000
*       /* RECEIVED FROM ASCBCHAP. IN THE PFTE(S), THE PCB DEFINED   */ 00248000
*       /* FLAG IS TURNED OFF. LSQA PCB/AIA(S) ARE MOVED TO THE FREE */ 00249000
*       /* QUEUE. NOTE THAT THIS MODULE ASSUMES THAT ONLY LSQA AIAS  */ 00250000
*       /* ARE ON THE CHAIN.                                         */ 00251000
*       /*                                                           */ 00252000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00253000
*                                                                  0157 00254000
*       NXTAIA=AIAPTR;              /* INITIALIZE THE NEXT AIA PTR 0157 00255000
*                                      WITH THE INPUT AIA ADDRESS    */ 00256000
         LR    NXTAIA,AIAPTR                                       0157 00257000
*FREEPCB:                                                          0158 00258000
*       ;                           /* BEGINNING OF LOOP SETTING   0158 00259000
*                                      PFTPCBSI OFF AND FREEING    0158 00260000
*                                      PCB(S)                        */ 00261000
FREEPCB  DS    0H                                                  0159 00262000
*       RFY                                                        0159 00263000
*         PFTEPTR RSTD;                                            0159 00264000
*       PFTEPTR=PVTPFTP+PCBRBN;     /* CALCULATE PFTE ADDRESS        */ 00265000
         LH    PFTEPTR,PCBRBN(,PCBPTR)                             0160 00266000
         N     PFTEPTR,@CF02185                                    0160 00267000
         AL    PFTEPTR,PVTPFTP(,PVTPTR)                            0160 00268000
*       PFTPCBSI=OFF;               /* SET PCB DEFINED FLAG OFF IN 0161 00269000
*                                      THE PFTE                      */ 00270000
         NI    PFTPCBSI(PFTEPTR),B'11110111'                       0161 00271000
*       R0=PCBFREQN;                /* GET THE FREE QUEUE ID         */ 00272000
         LA    R0,16                                               0162 00273000
*       R1=PCBPTR;                  /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE PCB TO    00274000
*                                      BE FREED                      */ 00275000
         LR    R1,PCBPTR                                           0163 00276000
*       NXTAIA=NXTAIA->AIANXAIA;    /* SAVE NEXT AIA POINTER         */ 00277000
         L     NXTAIA,AIANXAIA(,NXTAIA)                            0164 00278000
*       CALL IEAVPCB;               /* FREE THE PCB                  */ 00279000
         L     @15,PVTPCB(,PVTPTR)                                 0165 00280000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0165 00281000
*       IF NXTAIA¬=ZERO THEN        /* IS THERE ANOTHER AIA          */ 00282000
         LTR   NXTAIA,NXTAIA                                       0166 00283000
         BZ    @RF00166                                            0166 00284000
*         DO;                       /* YES                           */ 00285000
*           PCBPTR=NXTAIA-(LENGTH(PCB)-LENGTH(AIA));/* CALCULATE NEXT   00286000
*                                      PCB ADDRESS                   */ 00287000
         LR    PCBPTR,NXTAIA                                       0168 00288000
         SL    PCBPTR,@CF02181                                     0168 00289000
*           GOTO FREEPCB;           /* GO SET PFTPCBSI OFF AND FREE     00290000
*                                      PCB                           */ 00291000
         B     FREEPCB                                             0169 00292000
*         END;                                                     0170 00293000
*                                                                  0170 00294000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00295000
*       /*                                                           */ 00296000
*       /* END OF LOOP SETTING PFTPCBSI OFF AND FREEING PCBS         */ 00297000
*       /*                                                           */ 00298000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00299000
*                                                                  0171 00300000
*       ELSE                                                       0171 00301000
*         DO;                       /* PREPARE TO MEMTERM THE ADDRESS   00302000
*                                      SPACE                         */ 00303000
@RF00166 DS    0H                                                  0172 00304000
*MMTERM:                                                           0172 00305000
*           R13=ADDR(PVTSAVE);      /* SET SAVEAREA ADDRESS FOR    0172 00306000
*                                      MEMTERM                       */ 00307000
MMTERM   LA    R13,PVTSAVE(,PVTPTR)                                0172 00308000
*           R11=RSMASCB->ASCBASID;  /* GET ASID                      */ 00309000
*                                                                  0173 00310000
         L     @15,RSMASCB(,RSMHDPTR)                              0173 00311000
         LH    R11,ASCBASID(,@15)                                  0173 00312000
         N     R11,@CF02185                                        0173 00313000
*           /*********************************************************/ 00314000
*           /*                                                       */ 00315000
*           /* MEMTERM THE MEMORY FOR WHICH SWAPOUT FAILED           */ 00316000
*           /*                                                       */ 00317000
*           /*********************************************************/ 00318000
*                                                                  0174 00319000
*           GENERATE CODE REFS(R11,CVTBTERM,CVTMAP) SETS(R2);      0174 00320000
     CALLRTM TYPE=MEMTERM,COMPCOD=X'028',ASID=(R11)                     00321000
*         END;                      /* END OF MEMTERM PROCESSING     */ 00322000
*     END;                          /* END OF NON-ZERO RETURN CODE 0176 00323000
*                                      PROCESSING                    */ 00324000
*                                                                  0177 00325000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00326000
*   /*                                                               */ 00327000
*   /* DELETE FRR                                                    */ 00328000
*   /*                                                               */ 00329000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00330000
*                                                                  0177 00331000
*DELTEFRR:                                                         0177 00332000
*   GENERATE CODE REFS(PSA,PSACSTK,FRRS,FRRSELEN,FRRSCURR,FRRSEMP) SETS 00333000
*       (R4,R5);                                                   0177 00334000
*                                                                  0177 00335000
@RC00132 DS    0H                                                  0177 00336000
DELTEFRR DS    0H                                                  0177 00337000
      SETFRR D,WRKREGS=(R4,R5),RELATED=(RSM,IEAVSWPC(ESTFRR))           00338000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00339000
*   /*                                                               */ 00340000
*   /* RESTORE REGISTERS AND RETURN TO CALLER OF IEAVSWPC            */ 00341000
*   /*                                                               */ 00342000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00343000
*                                                                  0178 00344000
*   GENERATE NODEFS REFS(R13,R14,PVTWSA18,PVTPTR) NOSETS NOFLOWS   0178 00345000
*       NOSEQFLOW EXIT;                                            0178 00346000
      LM   R1,R14,PVTWSA18+12(PVTPTR) RESTORE CALLER'S REGISTERS        00347000
      BR   R14                     RETURN TO CALLER                     00348000
*                                                                  0179 00349000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00350000
*   /*                                                               */ 00351000
*   /* THIS IS THE RETRY ENTRY POINT FOR ERRORS ENCOUNTERED DURING   */ 00352000
*   /* SWAP COMPLETE PROCESSING IEAVRCV WILL RETRY INTO IEAVSWPC AT  */ 00353000
*   /* THIS POINT. NO ATTEMPT IS MADE TO FREE PCB'S OR FRAMES NOT    */ 00354000
*   /* FREED BEFORE THE PROGRAM CHECK OCCURRED. THIS RETRY ROUTINE   */ 00355000
*   /* MERELY ISSUES A MEMTERM FOR THE ADDRESS SPACE UNDERGOING      */ 00356000
*   /* SWAP-OUT                                                      */ 00357000
*   /*                                                               */ 00358000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00359000
*                                                                  0179 00360000
*SWPCEFRR:                                                         0179 00361000
*   ;                                                              0179 00362000
SWPCEFRR DS    0H                                                  0180 00363000
*   GENERATE CODE DEFS(RETRYSPC) REFS(BASEREG,BASE1) SETS(BASEREG,R8);  00364000
RETRYSPC BALR BASEREG,0                                                 00365000
         LA   R8,RETRYSPC-BASE1 GET AMOUNT TO ADJUST BY                 00366000
         SR   BASEREG,R8        ADJUST BASE REGISTER                    00367000
*   PCBPTR=R0;                      /* GET PCB ADDRESS               */ 00368000
         LR    PCBPTR,R0                                           0181 00369000
*   PVTPTR=CVTPVTP;                 /* GET PVT ADDRESS               */ 00370000
         L     @15,CVTPTR                                          0182 00371000
         L     PVTPTR,CVTPVTP(,@15)                                0182 00372000
*   RSMHDPTR=PCBASCB->ASCBRSM;      /* GET RSM HEADER ADDRESS        */ 00373000
         L     @15,PCBASCB(,PCBPTR)                                0183 00374000
         L     RSMHDPTR,ASCBRSM(,@15)                              0183 00375000
*   SPCTPTR=RSMSPCT;                /* GET SPCT ADDRESS              */ 00376000
         L     SPCTPTR,RSMSPCT(,RSMHDPTR)                          0184 00377000
*   SPCTOUT=OFF;                    /* INDICATE SWAP COMPLETE        */ 00378000
         NI    SPCTOUT(SPCTPTR),B'10111111'                        0185 00379000
*   GOTO MMTERM;                                                   0186 00380000
         B     MMTERM                                              0186 00381000
*   END IEAVSWPC                                                   0187 00382000
*                                                                  0187 00383000
*/* THE FOLLOWING INCLUDE STATEMENTS WERE FOUND IN THIS PROGRAM.     */ 00384000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (CVT     )                                       */ 00385000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHAPVT  )                                       */ 00386000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (ILRAIA  )                                       */ 00387000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHAASCB )                                       */ 00388000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (ILRASMVT)                                       */ 00389000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHAASXB )                                       */ 00390000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHAFRRS )                                       */ 00391000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHAPCB  )                                       */ 00392000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHARCA  )                                       */ 00393000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHAPSA  )                                       */ 00394000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHAWSAVT)                                       */ 00395000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHASPCT )                                       */ 00396000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHARSMHD)                                       */ 00397000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHAPFTE )                                       */ 00398000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHALCCA )                                       */ 00399000
*                                                                  0187 00400000
*       ;                                                          0187 00401000
@DATA    DS    0H                                                       00402000
@DATD    DSECT                                                          00403000
         DS    0F                                                       00404000
IEAVSWPC CSECT                                                          00405000
         DS    0F                                                       00406000
@CF02181 DC    F'36'                                                    00407000
@CF02155 DC    XL4'80000000'                                            00408000
@CF02185 DC    XL4'0000FFFF'                                            00409000
@DATD    DSECT                                                          00410000
         DS    0D                                                       00411000
@ENDDATD EQU   *                                                        00412000
IEAVSWPC CSECT                                                          00413000
         NOPR  ((@ENDDATD-@DATD)*16)                                    00414000
         DS    0F                                                       00415000
@SIZDATD DC    AL1(0)                                                   00416000
         DC    AL3(@ENDDATD-@DATD)                                      00417000
         DS    0D                                                       00418000
@00      EQU   00                      EQUATES FOR REGISTERS 0-15       00419000

@NM00029 EQU   FLCIOEL                                                  02398000
FLCCHNID EQU   FLCMCLA                                                  02399000
@NM00028 EQU   PSA+160                                                  02400000
FLCMTRCD EQU   PSA+157                                                  02401000
@NM00027 EQU   PSA+156                                                  02402000
FLCPERA  EQU   FLCPER+1                                                 02403000
@NM00026 EQU   FLCPER                                                   02404000
@NM00025 EQU   PSA+151                                                  02405000
FLCPERCD EQU   PSA+150                                                  02406000
FLCMCNUM EQU   PSA+149                                                  02407000
@NM00024 EQU   PSA+148                                                  02408000
FLCTEAA  EQU   FLCTEA+1                                                 02409000
@NM00023 EQU   FLCTEA                                                   02410000
PSAPIPC  EQU   PSAPICOD                                                 02411000
PSAPIMC  EQU   PSAPICOD                                                 02412000
PSAPIPER EQU   PSAPICOD                                                 02413000
PSARV049 EQU   FLCPICOD                                                 02414000
FLCPILCB EQU   FLCPIILC                                                 02415000
@NM00022 EQU   FLCPIILC                                                 02416000
@NM00021 EQU   PSAEPPSW                                                 02417000
FLCSVCN  EQU   PSAESPSW+2                                               02418000
FLCSILCB EQU   FLCSVILC                                                 02419000
@NM00020 EQU   FLCSVILC                                                 02420000
@NM00019 EQU   PSAESPSW                                                 02421000
FLCEICOD EQU   PSAEEPSW+2                                               02422000
PSASPAD  EQU   PSAEEPSW                                                 02423000
@NM00018 EQU   PSA+128                                                  02424000
FLCINPSW EQU   PSA+120                                                  02425000
FLCMNPSW EQU   PSA+112                                                  02426000
FLCPNPSW EQU   PSA+104                                                  02427000
FLCSNPSW EQU   PSA+96                                                   02428000
FLCENPSW EQU   PSA+88                                                   02429000

FLCCVT2  EQU   PSA+76                                                   02432000
FLCCAW   EQU   PSA+72                                                   02433000

FLCPOPSW EQU   PSA+40                                                   02437000

FLCEOPSW EQU   PSA+24                                                   02439000
@NM00017 EQU   FLCICCW2+4                                               02440000
FLCCVT   EQU   FLCICCW2                                                 02441000
FLCICCW1 EQU   FLCROPSW                                                 02442000
FLCIPPSW EQU   FLCRNPSW                                                 02443000
*                                      END UNREFERENCED COMPONENTS      02444000
@ENDDATA EQU   *                                                        02445000
         END   IEAVSWPC,(C'PLS2050',0701,76090)                         02446000
./  ADD  SSI=81310333,NAME=IEAVTERM
         TITLE 'IEAVTERM: PAGING TERMINATOR                            *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IEAVTERM CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IEAVTERM  78.131'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0001 00010000
         BALR  @10,0                                               0001 00011000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00012000
         USING @PSTART,@10                                         0001 00013000
*   RMPLPTR=R1->FOREPTRS;           /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE INPUT     00014000
*                                      RMPL. USE STANDARD LINKAGE  0084 00015000
*                                      CONV                          */ 00016000
         L     RMPLPTR,FOREPTRS(,R1)                               0084 00017000
*   RMWAPTR=RMPLRMWA;               /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE RMWA   */ 00018000
         L     RMWAPTR,RMPLRMWA(,RMPLPTR)                          0085 00019000
*   RMWA=RMWA&&RMWA;                /* CLEAR THE RMWA                */ 00020000
         XC    RMWA(64,RMWAPTR),RMWA(RMWAPTR)                      0086 00021000
*   RMWASA13=R13;                   /* SAVE THE ADDR OF THE SAVE AREA*/ 00022000
         ST    R13,RMWASA13(,RMWAPTR)                              0087 00023000
*   PVTPTR=CVTPVTP;                 /* GET THE PVT ADDRESS   @ZA19285*/ 00024000
         L     @12,CVTPTR                                          0088 00025000
         L     PVTPTR,CVTPVTP(,@12)                                0088 00026000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0089 00027000
*    (R11,                                                         0089 00028000
*     R12) RESTRICTED;                                             0089 00029000
*   IF RMPLTERM='1'B THEN           /* ADDR SPACE TERMINATING?     0090 00030000
*                                                            @ZA19285*/ 00031000
         TM    RMPLTERM(RMPLPTR),B'01000000'                       0090 00032000
         BNO   @RF00090                                            0090 00033000
*     DO;                           /* YES, PREVENT AND PURGE SWAP-IN   00034000
*                                                            @ZA19285*/ 00035000
*       RFY                                                        0092 00036000
*        (R0) RSTD;                 /*                       @ZA19285*/ 00037000
*       GEN SETS(R0) REFS(RMPLASID,RMPLPTR)                        0093 00038000
*           (SYSEVENT MEMDEL,ASIDL=RMPLASID(,RMPLPTR),TYPE=NOSWIN);/*   00039000
*                                                            @ZA19285*/ 00040000
         SYSEVENT MEMDEL,ASIDL=RMPLASID(,RMPLPTR),TYPE=NOSWIN           00041000
*       RFY                                                        0094 00042000

*       RMWPASID=RMPLASID;          /* PURGE ASID TO ASIDTCB @ZA19285*/ 00044000
         MVC   RMWPASID(2,RMWAPTR),RMPLASID(RMPLPTR)               0095 00045000
*       R11=ADDR(RMWASIDP);         /* ASIDTCB POINTER       @ZA19285*/ 00046000
         LA    R11,RMWASIDP(,RMWAPTR)                              0096 00047000
*       R12=PVTPSRBP;               /* RMTR ADDRESS          @ZA19285*/ 00048000
         L     R12,PVTPSRBP(,PVTPTR)                               0097 00049000
*       R1=ADDR(RMWAPDQL);          /* PURGEDQ PLIST ADDRESS @ZA19285*/ 00050000
         LA    R1,RMWAPDQL(,RMWAPTR)                               0098 00051000

*     END;                          /*                       @ZA19285*/ 00055000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0101 00056000
*    (R1) UNRESTRICTED;                                            0101 00057000
@RF00090 DS    0H                                                  0102 00058000
*   GENERATE CODE                   /* GET THE SALLOC AND LOCAL    0102 00059000
*                                      LOCKS.                        */ 00060000
*       REFS(PSALITA,FLC) SETS(R11,R12,R13,R14);                   0102 00061000
GETLOCL  SETLOCK OBTAIN,TYPE=LOCAL,MODE=UNCOND,                       **00062000
               RELATED=(RSM,IEAVTERM(FREELOCL),IEAVTERM(FREALOCL))      00063000
GETSALL  SETLOCK OBTAIN,TYPE=SALLOC,MODE=UNCOND,                      **00064000
               RELATED=(RSM,IEAVTERM(FREESALL))                         00065000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0103 00066000
*    (R12,                                                         0103 00067000

               RELATED=(RSM,IEAVTERM(FREEFRR))                          00079000

*   RMWAPVT=PVTPTR;                 /* SAVE PVT PTR FOR RESTORES   0109 00085000
*                                      ACROSS INTERFACES             */ 00086000
         ST    PVTPTR,RMWAPVT(,RMWAPTR)                            0109 00087000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0110 00088000
*    (R1,                                                          0110 00089000
*     R4,                                                          0110 00090000
*     R11) UNRESTRICTED;                                           0110 00091000
*   RCACSECT=RCACPTRM;              /* SET IEAVTERM CSECT ID         */ 00092000
         L     @12,PVTPRCA(,PVTPTR)                                0111 00093000
         MVI   RCACSECT(@12),X'11'                                 0111 00094000
*   RCATERM='1'B;                   /* SET MODULE ENTERED FLAG       */ 00095000
         OI    RCATERM(@12),B'00010000'                            0112 00096000

         OI    RCASAL(@12),B'11000000'                             0114 00099000
*   LLOCK='1'B;                     /* LOCAL LOCK HELD, SO SET FLAG     00100000
*                                                            @VS05446*/ 00101000
         OI    LLOCK(RMWAPTR),B'10000000'                          0115 00102000
*   RSMHDPTR=ASCBRSM;               /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE RSMHD     00103000
*                                      IN A REGISTER                 */ 00104000
         L     @12,RMPLASCB(,RMPLPTR)                              0116 00105000
         L     RSMHDPTR,ASCBRSM(,@12)                              0116 00106000
*   IF RSMHDPTR=0 THEN              /* TEST FOR NO RSMHD. THIS OCCURS   00107000

         SLR   @12,@12                                             0117 00110000

         BE    @RT00117                                            0117 00112000
*     GOTO GETOUT;                  /* EXIT. NO WORK TO DO.  @VS05446*/ 00113000

         TM    RMPLTERM(RMPLPTR),B'01000000'                       0119 00115000
         BNO   @RF00119                                            0119 00116000
*     DO;                           /* IS ASCB PURGE. THE ADDRESS  0120 00117000
