*                                      THE SWAP                      */ 00120000
*       IF SPCTOUT='1'B THEN        /* TEST FOR A SWAP OUT.          */ 00121000
         L     @11,RSMSPCT(,RSMHDPTR)                              0121 00122000
         TM    SPCTOUT(@11),B'01000000'                            0121 00123000
         BNO   @RF00121                                            0121 00124000
*         DO;                       /*                       @Z40WPYD*/ 00125000

         L     @11,SPCTSWRT(,@11)                                  0123 00128000
         CR    @11,@12                                             0123 00129000
         BE    @RF00123                                            0123 00130000
*             DO;                                                  0124 00131000

         TM    SPCTSWIN(@12),B'10000000'                           0130 00149000
         BNO   @RF00130                                            0130 00150000
*           DO;                     /* IS A SWAP IN. CANCEL THE SWAP.*/ 00151000
*             RESPECIFY                                            0132 00152000
*               PCBR BASED(SPCTSWRT);                              0132 00153000
*             PCBRFAIL='0'B;        /* IGNORE ANY I/O FAILURES.      */ 00154000

         NI    PCBRFAIL(@12),B'11110111'                           0134 00160000
*             RSMFAIL='1'B;         /* SET FAIL TO FORCE SWAPIN ROOT    00161000
*                                      EXIT THROUGH ITS ERROR PATH 0135 00162000
*                                                            @Z40WPYD*/ 00163000
         OI    RSMFAIL(RSMHDPTR),B'00000010'                       0135 00164000
*             RESPECIFY                                            0136 00165000
*               PCBR BASED(PCBRPTR);                               0136 00166000
*           END;                                                   0137 00167000
*                                                                  0137 00168000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00169000
*       /*                                                           */ 00170000
*       /* SINCE PURGE TYPE IS ASCB, THE LOCAL LOCK IS NOT NEEDED    */ 00171000
*       /* (VTERM DOES NOT RUN IN THE ADDRESS SPACE IT IS TERMINATING*/ 00172000
*       /* ON ASCB PURGE.) FREE THE LOCAL LOCK.                      */ 00173000
*       /*                                                           */ 00174000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00175000
*                                                                  0138 00176000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0138 00177000
*        (R11,                                                     0138 00178000
*         R12,                                                     0138 00179000
*         R13) RESTRICTED;                                         0138 00180000
@RF00130 DS    0H                                                  0138 00181000
@RC00121 DS    0H                                                  0139 00182000
*       GENERATE CODE               /* FREE THE LOCAL LOCK           */ 00183000
*           REFS(PSALITA,FLC) SETS(R11,R12,R13,R14);               0139 00184000
FREALOCL SETLOCK RELEASE,TYPE=LOCAL,                                  **00185000
               RELATED=(RSM,IEAVTERM(GETLOCL))                          00186000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0140 00187000
*        (R11,                                                     0140 00188000
*         R12,                                                     0140 00189000
*         R13) UNRESTRICTED;                                       0140 00190000
*       RCALL='0'B;                 /* LOCAL LOCK NOT HELD,SO ZERO 0141 00191000
*                                      FLAG                          */ 00192000
         L     @12,PVTPRCA(,PVTPTR)                                0141 00193000
         NI    RCALL(@12),B'10111111'                              0141 00194000
*       LLOCK='0'B;                 /* LOCAL LOCK NOT HELD,SO ZERO 0142 00195000
*                                      INTERNAL FLAG         @VS05446*/ 00196000
         NI    LLOCK(RMWAPTR),B'01111111'                          0142 00197000
*     END;                          /* END SWAP ROOT INTERCEPTION.   */ 00198000
*   CALL TERMPGQ;                   /* CALL THE PAGING QUIESCE     0144 00199000
*                                      SUBROUTINE                    */ 00200000
@RF00119 BAL   @14,TERMPGQ                                         0144 00201000
*   IF RMPLTERM='1'B THEN           /* TEST FOR ASCB PURGE           */ 00202000
         TM    RMPLTERM(RMPLPTR),B'01000000'                       0145 00203000
         BNO   @RF00145                                            0145 00204000
*     DO;                           /* IS ASCB PURGE, SO CALL DELETE    00205000
*                                      ADDRESS SPACE TO GET RID OF 0146 00206000
*                                      THE ADDRESS SPACE AND FREE ITS   00207000
*                                      RESOURCES                     */ 00208000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0147 00209000
*        (R1) RESTRICTED;                                          0147 00210000
*       R1=RMPLASCB;                /* GET THE ASCB TO BE DELETED AND   00211000
*                                      PASS IT TO DELETE A.S.        */ 00212000
         L     R1,RMPLASCB(,RMPLPTR)                               0148 00213000
*/********************************************************************/ 00214000
*/*                                                                  */ 00215000
*/*               DELETE ADDRESS SPACE                               */ 00216000
*/*             INPUT:                                               */ 00217000
*/*        R0: UNUSED                                                */ 00218000
*/*        R1: ADDRESS OF ASCB TO BE DELETED                         */ 00219000
*/*        R2: ADDRESS OF RSMHD TO BE DELETED                        */ 00220000
*/*        R3: ADDRESS OF PVT                                        */ 00221000
*/*        R4 - R13: UNUSED                                          */ 00222000
*/*        R14: RETURN ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR                        */ 00223000
*/*        R15: ENTRY POINT ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR                   */ 00224000
*/*             OUTPUT:                                              */ 00225000
*/*        R0 - R15: RESTORED                                        */ 00226000
*/*                                                                  */ 00227000
*/********************************************************************/ 00228000
*                                                                  0149 00229000
*       CALL IEAVDLAS;              /* CALL THE DELETE ADDRESS SPACE    00230000
*                                      ROUTINE                       */ 00231000
         L     @15,@CV02177                                        0149 00232000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0149 00233000
*       RCACSECT=RCACPTRM;          /* RESET THE MODULE ID           */ 00234000
         L     @12,PVTPRCA(,PVTPTR)                                0150 00235000
         MVI   RCACSECT(@12),X'11'                                 0150 00236000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0151 00237000
*        (R1) UNRESTRICTED;                                        0151 00238000
*     END;                                                         0152 00239000
*                                                                  0152 00240000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00241000
*   /*                                                               */ 00242000
*   /* MUST BE RB PURGE OR TCB PURGE TO BE HERE                      */ 00243000
*   /*                                                               */ 00244000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00245000
*                                                                  0153 00246000
*   ELSE                            /* NOT ASCB PURGE                */ 00247000
*     IF(RMPLRBPP='0'B&RMPLIPUF='0'B) THEN/* TEST FOR A TCB PURGE AND   00248000
*                                      IF FIX PURGES ARE TO BE DONE. */ 00249000
         B     @RC00145                                            0153 00250000
@RF00145 TM    RMPLRBPP(RMPLPTR),B'00110000'                       0153 00251000
         BNZ   @RF00153                                            0153 00252000
*       CALL TERMPFIX;              /* FIXES ARE TO BE PURGED, SO  0154 00253000
*                                      CALL THE FIX PURGE SUBROUTINE */ 00254000
         BAL   @14,TERMPFIX                                        0154 00255000
*GETOUT:                                                           0155 00256000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0155 00257000
*    (R4,                                                          0155 00258000
*     R11,                                                         0155 00259000
*     R12,                                                         0155 00260000
*     R13) RESTRICTED;                                             0155 00261000
@RF00153 DS    0H                                                  0155 00262000
@RC00145 DS    0H                                                  0155 00263000
GETOUT   DS    0H                                                  0156 00264000
*   GENERATE CODE                   /* REMOVE THE RSM FRR            */ 00265000
*       REFS(PSA,PSACSTK,FRRSCURR,FRRS,FRRSELEN,FRRSCURR,FRRSFRRA, 0156 00266000
*       FRRSENTR,FRRSPARM) SETS(R4,R11);                           0156 00267000
FREEFRR  SETFRR D,WRKREGS=(4,11),                                     **00268000
               RELATED=(RSM,IEAVTERM(GETFRR))                           00269000
*   GENERATE CODE                   /* FREE THE SALLOC               */ 00270000
*       REFS(PSALITA,FLC) SETS(R11,R12,R13,R14);                   0157 00271000
FREESALL SETLOCK RELEASE,TYPE=SALLOC,                                 **00272000
               RELATED=(RSM,IEAVTERM(GETSALL))                          00273000
*   IF LLOCK='1'B THEN              /* TEST IF LOCAL LOCK HELD.      */ 00274000
         TM    LLOCK(RMWAPTR),B'10000000'                          0158 00275000
         BNO   @RF00158                                            0158 00276000
*     GENERATE CODE                 /* FREE THE LOCAL LOCK           */ 00277000
*         REFS(PSALITA,FLC) SETS(R11,R12,R13,R14);                 0159 00278000
FREELOCL SETLOCK RELEASE,TYPE=LOCAL,                                  **00279000
               RELATED=(RSM,IEAVTERM(GETLOCL))                          00280000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0160 00281000
*      (R4,                                                        0160 00282000
*       R11,                                                       0160 00283000
*       R12) UNRESTRICTED;                                         0160 00284000
@RF00158 DS    0H                                                  0161 00285000
*   R13=RMWASA13;                   /* RESTORE THE SAVE AREA POINTER */ 00286000
         L     R13,RMWASA13(,RMWAPTR)                              0161 00287000
*   RETURN CODE(0);                 /* RETURN TO RTM. RETURN CODE IS    00288000
*                                      ALWAYS ZERO UNLESS DESIGN IS     00289000
*                                      CHANGED.                      */ 00290000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0162 00291000
         L     @14,12(,@13)                                        0162 00292000
         LM    @00,@12,20(@13)                                     0162 00293000
         BR    @14                                                 0162 00294000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0163 00295000
*    (R13) UNRESTRICTED;                                           0163 00296000
*                                                                  0164 00297000
*/********************************************************************/ 00298000
*/*                                                                  */ 00299000
*/* THE PAGING PURGE SUBROUTINE IS CALLED BY THE MAINLINE TO PURGE   */ 00300000
*/* ALL PCBS FOR THE FUNCTION UNDERGOING TERMINATION. THIS ROUTINE   */ 00301000
*/* SCANS THE GFA DEFER, THE COMMON I/O ACTIVE, AND THEN THE LOCAL   */ 00302000
*/* I/O ACTIVE PCB QUEUES SEARCHING FOR PCBS (QUEUED AND RELATED)    */ 00303000
*/* IN OPERATION FOR THE FUNCTION BEING PURGED. ONCE A PCB FOR THE   */ 00304000
*/* FUNCTION BEING PURGED IS LOCATED, IT IS PROCESSED AS DESCRIBED   */ 00305000
*/* BELOW. IF THE PCB IS TO BE FREED, IT IS RETURNED TO THE FREE PCB */ 00306000
*/* QUEUE. ONCE PROCESSING IS COMPLETE, IF THE PURGE TYPE IS RB,     */ 00307000
*/* CONTROL IS RETURNED TO THE MAINLINE PROCESSOR BECAUSE THE ONLY   */ 00308000
*/* PCB FOR THE RB HAS BEEN PURGED. OTHERWISE, THE NEXT PCB IS       */ 00309000
*/* OBTAINED AND PROCESSED. ONCE ALL PCBS ON A QUEUE HAVE BEEN       */ 00310000
*/* PROCESSED, OR IF NO PCBS WERE FOUND FOR A RB PURGE, THE NEXT     */ 00311000
*/* QUEUE IS SELECTED AND SEARCHED. AT THE END OF THE THREE PCB      */ 00312000
*/* QUEUES, CONTROL IS RETURNED TO THE MAINLINE FOR FURTHER          */ 00313000
*/* PROCESSING.                                                      */ 00314000
*/* EACH PCB ON THE THREE QUEUES IS TESTED TO DETERMINE IF THE PCB   */ 00315000
*/* IS FOR THE ADDRESS SPACE IN WHICH THE TERMINATING FUNCTION WAS   */ 00316000
*/* RUNNING. IF NOT, THE PCB IS TESTED FOR A COMMON AREA FIX SWAP    */ 00317000
*/* IN FOR THE ASCB BEING TERMINATED. IF SO, THE SWAP FLAGS ARE      */ 00318000
*/* TURNED OFF IN THE PCB. IF THE I/O IS COMPLETE AND THIS PCB IS THE*/ 00319000
*/* ONLY PCB FOR THE PAGE, THE FRAME IS FREED. IF THE PCB IS A       */ 00320000
*/* RELATED PCB OR THE I/O IS COMPLETE, THE PCB IS MARKED TO BE FREED*/ 00321000
*/* LATER. THE SWAP IN ROOT COUNT IS DECREMENTED BY ONE, AND THE ROOT*/ 00322000
*/* EXIT IS CALLED IF THE COUNT IS NOW ZERO. THE PCB IS FREED IF     */ 00323000
*/* NECESSARY AND THE NEXT PCB IS OBTAINED AND PROCESSED.            */ 00324000
*/* IF THE PCB IS FOR THE ADDRESS SPACE BEING PROCESSED, THE PURGE   */ 00325000
*/* TYPE IS TESTED. IF ASCB PURGE, THEN THE PCB MUST BE PURGED.      */ 00326000
*/* THE PCB IS TESTED TO SEE IF IT IS FOR A SRB ROUTINE WHICH MUST BE*/ 00327000
*/* RESET. IF SO, THE ROUTINE IS RESET. FOR ALL ASCB PURGES, THE PCB */ 00328000
*/* IS PASSED TO THE PCB PURGE ROUTINE. IF THE PURGE TYPE IS TCB, THE*/ 00329000
*/* TCB ADDRESS IN THE PCB IS COMPARED TO THE TCB ADDRESS BEING      */ 00330000
*/* PURGED. IF EQUAL, THE TCB IS PASSED TO THE PCB PURGE ROUTINE;    */ 00331000
*/* OTHERWISE, THE NEXT PCB IS OBTAINED AND PROCESSED. IF THE PURGE  */ 00332000
*/* TYPE IS NOT ASCB OR TCB, IT MUST BE RB. IF THE PCB IS FOR THE RB */ 00333000
*/* BEING PURGED, THE RESET SUBROUTINE IS CALLED AND THE PCB IS      */ 00334000
*/* PASSED TO THE PCB PURGE ROUTINE. OTHERWISE, THE NEXT PCB IS      */ 00335000
*/* OBTAINED AND PROCESSED.                                          */ 00336000
*/* THE PCB PURGE ROUTINE CONTROLS THE ACTUAL PURGE OF THE PCB. IF   */ 00337000
*/* THE PCB IS ON THE GFA DEFERRED QUEUE AND IS A QUEUED PCB WITH NO */ 00338000
*/* RELATED PCBS, THE XPTDEFER FLAG IS TURNED OFF TO PREVENT FURTHER */ 00339000
*/* RELATING TO THE PCB. ALSO, IF THE DEFERRED PCB HAS A ROOT        */ 00340000
*/* PCB, THE ROOT PURGE SUBROUTINE IS CALLED TO PURGE THE ROOT PCB.  */ 00341000
*/* DEFERRED PCBS ARE ALWAYS FREED AS THERE IS NO I/O IN PROGRESS    */ 00342000
*/* FOR THEM. ONCE FREED, THE NEXT PCB IS OBTAINED AND PROCESSED.    */ 00343000
*/* IF THE PCB IS ON AN I/O ACTIVE QUEUE, THE I/O PURGE              */ 00344000
*/* SUBROUTINE IS CALLED TO PURGE THE PCB. ON RETURN, IF             */ 00345000
*/* THE PCB IS TO BE FREED, IT IS FREED. THE NEXT PCB IS THEN        */ 00346000
*/* OBTAINED AND PROCESSED. AFTER ALL PROCESSING IS DONE, THE NEXT   */ 00347000
*/* QUEUE IS OBTAINED AND PROCESSED AS ABOVE. WHEN ALL QUEUES HAVE   */ 00348000
*/* BEEN PROCESSED, CONTROL RETURNS TO THE CALLER.                   */ 00349000
*/*                                                                  */ 00350000
*/* THE FOLLOWING REGISTER VARIABLES ARE USED TO PROCESS THE PCB     */ 00351000
*/* QUEUES:                                                          */ 00352000
*/*        PCBPTR: THIS ALWAYS POINTS TO THE PCB BEING PROCESSED. IT */ 00353000
*/*                CANNOT BE ASSUMED THAT THE FOREWARD POINTER IN THE*/ 00354000
*/*                PCB POINTED TO BY PCBPTR IS THE NEXT PCB TO BE    */ 00355000
*/*                PROCESSED BECAUSE AFTER THE PCB IS FREED, PCBPTR  */ 00356000
*/*                WILL STILL POINT TO THE PCB NOW ON THE FREE QUEUE.*/ 00357000
*/*                METHOD OF OBTAINING THE NEXT PCB TO BE PROCESSED  */ 00358000
*/*                IS DESCRIBED BELOW.                               */ 00359000
*/*        PRIPCB: THIS POINTS TO THE LAST PROCESSED PRIMARY PCB     */ 00360000
*/*                WHEN SCANNING A QUEUE. THE ONLY EXCEPTION IS WHEN */ 00361000
*/*                PCBPTR POINTS TO THE FIRST PCB ON A QUEUE: THEN,  */ 00362000
*/*                PRIPCB POINTS TO THE APPROPRIATE QUEUE HEADER.    */ 00363000
*/*                THE PURPOSE OF THIS POINTER IS TO HAVE THE        */ 00364000
*/*                ADDRESS OF THE FIELD WHICH WILL HAVE THE ADDRESS  */ 00365000
*/*                OF THE NEXT PRIMARY PCB TO BE PROCESSED. WHEN ALL */ 00366000
*/*                RELATED PCBS (RELATED TO THE PCB POINTED TO BY    */ 00367000
*/*                PRIPCB) ARE PROCESSED, PRIPCB WILL POINT TO THE   */ 00368000
*/*                FIELD CONTAINING THE ADDRESS OF THE NEXT PRIMARY  */ 00369000
*/*                PCB TO BE PROCESSED.                              */ 00370000
*/*        RELPCB: THIS POINTS TO THE LAST PROCESSED RELATED PCB ON  */ 00371000
*/*                THE RELATED CHAIN. THIS POINTER IS USED TO RECHAIN*/ 00372000
*/*                RELATED PCBS WHEN A RELATED PCB HAS BEEN REMOVED  */ 00373000
*/*                FROM THE RELATED CHAIN AND PURGED AND TO  OBTAIN  */ 00374000
*/*                THE ADDRESS OF THE NEXT RELATED PCB.IF THE RELATED*/ 00375000
*/*                POINTER IN THE PCB ADDRESSED BY  RELPCB IS ZERO,  */ 00376000
*/*                THEN THERE ARE NO MORE RELATED  PCBS FOR THIS     */ 00377000
*/*                PRIMARY PCB, AND THE NEXT PRIMARY PCB IS OBTAINED */ 00378000
*/*                AND PROCESSED. IF THE RELATED  POINTER IS NOT     */ 00379000
*/*                ZERO, THEN THE RELATED POINTER IS THE ADDRESS OF  */ 00380000
*/*                THE NEXT PCB TO BE PROCESSED.                     */ 00381000
*/*        BACKPCB: THIS POINTS TO THE FIELD WHICH WILL HAVE THE     */ 00382000
*/*                ADDRESS OF THE NEXT PCB TO BE PROCESSED (PRIMARY  */ 00383000
*/*                OR RELATED) WHEN THE PCB POINTED TO BY PCBPTR     */ 00384000
*/*                IS BEING FREED. THIS FIELD IS USED ONLY IF        */ 00385000
*/*                THE CURRENT PCB IS ACTUALLY FREED, AND IS SET     */ 00386000
*/*                USING PRIPCB OR RELPCB                            */ 00387000
*/*                                                                  */ 00388000
*/********************************************************************/ 00389000
*                                                                  0164 00390000
*TERMPGQ:                                                          0164 00391000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               0164 00392000
TERMPGQ  DS    0H                                                  0165 00393000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0165 00394000
*    (R14) RESTRICTED;                                             0165 00395000
*   RMWALVL1=R14;                   /* SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS       */ 00396000
         ST    R14,RMWALVL1(,RMWAPTR)                              0166 00397000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0167 00398000
*    (R14) UNRESTRICTED;                                           0167 00399000
*   RMWAGFAD='1'B;                  /* SET THE GFA DEFER QUEUE FLAG  */ 00400000
         OI    RMWAGFAD(RMWAPTR),B'10000000'                       0168 00401000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0169 00402000
*    (PCBPTR,                                                      0169 00403000
*     PRIPCB,                                                      0169 00404000
*     RELPCB) RESTRICTED;                                          0169 00405000
*   PCBPTR=PVTGFADF;                /* GET THE FIRST GFA DEFER PCB   */ 00406000
         L     PCBPTR,PVTGFADF(,PVTPTR)                            0170 00407000
*   PRIPCB=ADDR(PVTGFADF);          /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE      0171 00408000
*                                      LOCATION OF THE NEXT PCB IF 0171 00409000
*                                      THE FIRST IS TO BE FREED      */ 00410000
         LA    PRIPCB,PVTGFADF(,PVTPTR)                            0171 00411000
*   RELPCB=0;                       /* ZERO THE POINTER TO THE     0172 00412000
*                                      RELATED PCB                   */ 00413000
         SLR   RELPCB,RELPCB                                       0172 00414000
*   GOTO TESTPCB;                   /* GO TEST IF THE PCB IS TO BE 0173 00415000
*                                      PROCESSED                     */ 00416000
         B     TESTPCB                                             0173 00417000
*                                                                  0174 00418000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00419000
*   /*                                                               */ 00420000
*   /* THIS SECTION GETS THE NEXT PCB TO BE PROCESSED AND UPDATES THE*/ 00421000
*   /* APPROPRIATE REGISTER QUEUE POINTERS.                          */ 00422000
*   /*                                                               */ 00423000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00424000
*                                                                  0174 00425000
*NEXTPCB:                                                          0174 00426000
*   IF RELPCB=0 THEN                /* TEST IF THIS IS THE FIRST   0174 00427000
*                                      RELATED PCB FOR THE PRIMARY   */ 00428000
NEXTPCB  LTR   RELPCB,RELPCB                                       0174 00429000
         BNZ   @RF00174                                            0174 00430000
*     PRIPCB=PCBPTR;                /* IS THE FIRST RELATED. SET PRIM   00431000
*                                      PTR TO POINT TO THE JUST-DONE    00432000
*                                      PRIMARY                       */ 00433000
         LR    PRIPCB,PCBPTR                                       0175 00434000
*   IF PCBRLPA=0 THEN               /* TEST IF A RELATED PCB EXISTS  */ 00435000
@RF00174 L     @04,PCBRLPA-1(,PCBPTR)                              0176 00436000
         LA    @04,0(,@04)                                         0176 00437000
         LTR   @04,@04                                             0176 00438000
         BNZ   @RF00176                                            0176 00439000
*     DO;                           /* NO RELATED PCB, SO SET UP PTRS   00440000
*                                      TO PROCESS THE NEXT PRIMARY 0177 00441000
*                                      PCB                           */ 00442000
*       RELPCB=0;                   /* ZERO THE LAST-RELATED POINTER */ 00443000
         SLR   RELPCB,RELPCB                                       0178 00444000
*       PCBPTR=PRIPCB->PCBFQPA;     /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE NEXT 0179 00445000
*                                      PRIMARY PCB ON THE QUEUE      */ 00446000
         L     PCBPTR,PCBFQPA-1(,PRIPCB)                           0179 00447000
         LA    PCBPTR,0(,PCBPTR)                                   0179 00448000
*     END;                                                         0180 00449000
*   ELSE                            /* RELATEDS EXIST, SO SET UP PTRS   00450000
*                                      TO PROCESS THE NEXT RELATED 0181 00451000
*                                      PCB FOR THIS PRIMARY          */ 00452000
*     DO;                           /* GET RELATED POINTERS          */ 00453000
         B     @RC00176                                            0181 00454000
@RF00176 DS    0H                                                  0182 00455000
*       RELPCB=PCBPTR;              /* SET THE POINTER TO THE LAST 0182 00456000
*                                      PCB PROCESSED                 */ 00457000
         LR    RELPCB,PCBPTR                                       0182 00458000
*       PCBPTR=PCBRLPA;             /* GET THE POINTER TO THE NEXT 0183 00459000
*                                      PCB TO BE PROCESSED (IS     0183 00460000
*                                      RELATED)                      */ 00461000
         L     @04,PCBRLPA-1(,PCBPTR)                              0183 00462000
         LA    @04,0(,@04)                                         0183 00463000
         LR    PCBPTR,@04                                          0183 00464000
*     END;                                                         0184 00465000
*TESTPCB:                                                          0185 00466000
*   IF PCBPTR¬=0 THEN               /* TEST IF THERE IS A PCB        */ 00467000
@RC00176 DS    0H                                                  0185 00468000
TESTPCB  LTR   PCBPTR,PCBPTR                                       0185 00469000
         BNZ   @RT00185                                            0185 00470000
*     GOTO TESTASCB;                /* PCB EXISTS, GO PROCESS IT     */ 00471000
*NEXTQUE:                                                          0187 00472000
*                                                                  0187 00473000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00474000
*   /*                                                               */ 00475000
*   /* THIS SECTION GETS THE NEXT QUEUE TO BE PROCESSED. THE ORDER OF*/ 00476000
*   /* PROCESSING IS: GFA DEFER QUEUE, COMMON I/O ACTIVE QUEUE, LOCAL*/ 00477000
*   /* I/O ACTIVE QUEUE.                                             */ 00478000
*   /*                                                               */ 00479000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00480000
*                                                                  0187 00481000
*   IF RMWACIOQ='0'B THEN           /* TEST FOR PROCESSING THE COMMON   00482000
*                                      I/O QUEUE                     */ 00483000
NEXTQUE  TM    RMWACIOQ(RMWAPTR),B'01000000'                       0187 00484000
         BNZ   @RF00187                                            0187 00485000
*     DO;                           /* NOT PROCESSING THE C. I/O Q.,    00486000
*                                      SO MIGHT BE DONE: CHECK IT    */ 00487000
*       IF RMWALIOQ='1'B THEN       /* TEST IF LOCAL I/O QUEUE WAS 0189 00488000
*                                      LAST QUEUE PROCESSED. IF SO,     00489000
*                                      ARE DONE AND CAN EXIT         */ 00490000
         TM    RMWALIOQ(RMWAPTR),B'00100000'                       0189 00491000
         BO    @RT00189                                            0189 00492000
*         GOTO EXITPGQ;             /* GO TO THE EXIT POINT          */ 00493000
*                                                                  0190 00494000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00495000
*       /*                                                           */ 00496000
*       /* IF HERE THEN ONLY THE GFAD QUEUE HAS BEEN DONE. SET UP TO */ 00497000
*       /* PROCESS THE COMMON I/O QUEUE.                             */ 00498000
*       /*                                                           */ 00499000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00500000
*                                                                  0191 00501000
*       PRIPCB=ADDR(PVTCIOQF);      /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE C I/O     00502000
*                                      QUEUE PTRS IF THE FIRST PCB IS   00503000
*                                      TO BE FREED                   */ 00504000
         LA    PRIPCB,PVTCIOQF(,PVTPTR)                            0191 00505000
*       PCBPTR=PVTCIOQF;            /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE FIRST     00506000
*                                      COMMON I/O Q PCB              */ 00507000
*                                                                  0192 00508000
         L     PCBPTR,PVTCIOQF(,PVTPTR)                            0192 00509000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00510000
*       /*                                                           */ 00511000
*       /* IF THE INTERNAL FLAGS IN THE RMWA EVER BECOME REDEFINED,  */ 00512000
*       /* THE FOLLOWING INSTRUCTION MAY NEED TO BE CHANGED.         */ 00513000
*       /*                                                           */ 00514000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00515000
*                                                                  0193 00516000
*       RMWAFLG1='40'X;             /* TURN OFF GFA DEFERRED FLAG AND   00517000
*                                      TURN ON COMMON I/O FLAG       */ 00518000
         MVI   RMWAFLG1(RMWAPTR),X'40'                             0193 00519000
*     END;                                                         0194 00520000
*   ELSE                            /* COMMON I/O QUEUE WAS JUST   0195 00521000
*                                      DONE, SO PROCESS THE LOCAL I/O   00522000
*                                      QUEUE                         */ 00523000
*     DO;                           /* SET UP FOR THE L I/O Q        */ 00524000
         B     @RC00187                                            0195 00525000
@RF00187 DS    0H                                                  0196 00526000
*       PRIPCB=ADDR(RSMLIOQF);      /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE LOCAL     00527000
*                                      I/O QUEUE PTRS IF THE FIRST 0196 00528000
*                                      PCB IS TO BE FREED            */ 00529000
         LA    PRIPCB,RSMLIOQF(,RSMHDPTR)                          0196 00530000
*       PCBPTR=RSMLIOQF;            /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE FIRST     00531000
*                                      LOCAL I/O Q PCB               */ 00532000
*                                                                  0197 00533000
         L     PCBPTR,RSMLIOQF(,RSMHDPTR)                          0197 00534000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00535000
*       /*                                                           */ 00536000
*       /* IF THE INTERNAL FLAGS IN THE RMWA EVER BECOME REDEFINED,  */ 00537000
*       /* THE FOLLOWING INSTRUCTION MAY NEED TO BE CHANGED.         */ 00538000
*       /*                                                           */ 00539000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00540000
*                                                                  0198 00541000
*       RMWAFLG1='20'X;             /* TURN OFF COMMON I/O FLAG AND     00542000
*                                      TURN ON THE LOCAL I/O FLAG    */ 00543000
         MVI   RMWAFLG1(RMWAPTR),X'20'                             0198 00544000
*     END;                                                         0199 00545000
*   RELPCB=0;                       /* ZERO THE POINTER TO A RELATED    00546000
*                                      PCB                           */ 00547000
@RC00187 SLR   RELPCB,RELPCB                                       0200 00548000
*   GOTO TESTPCB;                   /* GO PROCESS THE FIRST PCB ON 0201 00549000
*                                      THE NEW QUEUE                 */ 00550000
         B     TESTPCB                                             0201 00551000
*TESTASCB:                                                         0202 00552000
*   IF PCBASCB¬=RMPLASCB THEN       /* TEST IF THE PCB IS FOR THE  0202 00553000
*                                      ADDRESS SPACE BEING PROCESSED */ 00554000
TESTASCB CLC   PCBASCB(4,PCBPTR),RMPLASCB(RMPLPTR)                 0202 00555000
         BE    @RF00202                                            0202 00556000
*     DO;                           /* PCB IS NOT FOR THE CURRENT  0203 00557000
*                                      ADDRESS SPACE, SO TEST FOR A     00558000
*                                      STG1 COMMON AREA FIX SWAP IN. */ 00559000
*                                                                  0203 00560000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00561000
*       /*                                                           */ 00562000
*       /* TEST FOR A COMMON AREA SWAP IN ( MUST BE A FIX.)          */ 00563000
*       /*                                                           */ 00564000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00565000
*                                                                  0204 00566000
*       IF SPCTSWIN='1'B&PCBROOT='1'B&PCBRTPA=SPCTSWRT THEN        0204 00567000
*                                                                  0204 00568000
         L     @04,RSMSPCT(,RSMHDPTR)                              0204 00569000
         TM    SPCTSWIN(@04),B'10000000'                           0204 00570000
         BNO   @RF00204                                            0204 00571000
         TM    PCBROOT(PCBPTR),B'00000100'                         0204 00572000
         BNO   @RF00204                                            0204 00573000
         L     @15,PCBRTPA-1(,PCBPTR)                              0204 00574000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0204 00575000
         C     @15,SPCTSWRT(,@04)                                  0204 00576000
         BNE   @RF00204                                            0204 00577000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00578000
*         /*                                                         */ 00579000
*         /* ABOVE TESTS TRUE.                                       */ 00580000
*         /*                                                         */ 00581000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00582000
*                                                                  0205 00583000
*         DO;                       /* PCB IS FOR A SWAP IN. PURGE 0205 00584000
*                                      IT.                           */ 00585000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0206 00586000
*            (PFTEPTR) RESTRICTED;                                 0206 00587000
*           PFTEPTR=PVTPFTP+PCBRBN; /* GET THE PFTE ADDRESS.         */ 00588000
         LH    PFTEPTR,PCBRBN(,PCBPTR)                             0207 00589000
         N     PFTEPTR,@CF02318                                    0207 00590000
         AL    PFTEPTR,PVTPFTP(,PVTPTR)                            0207 00591000
*           PFTFXCT=PFTFXCT-PCBFXC; /* WHEN PURGING C.A.     @YA01572*/ 00592000
         LH    @07,PFTFXCT(,PFTEPTR)                               0208 00593000
         SLR   @04,@04                                             0208 00594000
         IC    @04,PCBFXC(,PCBPTR)                                 0208 00595000
         SLR   @07,@04                                             0208 00596000
         STH   @07,PFTFXCT(,PFTEPTR)                               0208 00597000
*           IF PFTFXCT=0 THEN       /* SWIN PCBS, & PFTE     @YA01572*/ 00598000
         LTR   @07,@07                                             0209 00599000
         BNZ   @RF00209                                            0209 00600000
*             DO;                   /* FXCNT = 0, MUST       @YA01572*/ 00601000
*               PVTCOMFX=PVTCOMFX-1;/* DECREMENTNPVTCOMFX    @YA01572*/ 00602000
         LH    @07,PVTCOMFX(,PVTPTR)                               0211 00603000
         BCTR  @07,0                                               0211 00604000
         STH   @07,PVTCOMFX(,PVTPTR)                               0211 00605000
*               PVTCNTFX=PVTCNTFX-1;/* AND PVTCNTFX          @YA01572*/ 00606000
         LH    @07,PVTCNTFX(,PVTPTR)                               0212 00607000
         BCTR  @07,0                                               0212 00608000
         STH   @07,PVTCNTFX(,PVTPTR)                               0212 00609000
*             END;                                                 0213 00610000
*           ELSE                                                   0214 00611000
*             ;                                                    0214 00612000
@RF00209 DS    0H                                                  0215 00613000
*           PCBFXC=0;               /* ZERO THE PCB FIX COUNT.       */ 00614000
         MVI   PCBFXC(PCBPTR),X'00'                                0215 00615000
*           PCBSWPIN='0'B;          /* TURN OFF THE SWAP IN FLAG     */ 00616000
*           PCBSWPS1='0'B;          /* TURN OFF THE STAGE 1 FLAG     */ 00617000
*           PCBDFRLS='0'B;          /* TURN OFF THE DEFERRED RELEASE    00618000
*                                      FLAG.                         */ 00619000
         NI    PCBSWPIN(PCBPTR),B'10010111'                        0218 00620000
*           PCBROOT='0'B;           /* TURN OFF THE ROOT FLAG.       */ 00621000
         NI    PCBROOT(PCBPTR),B'11111011'                         0219 00622000
*           IF PCBIOCMP='1'B THEN   /* TEST IF THE I/O HAS ALREADY 0220 00623000
*                                      COMPLETED.                    */ 00624000
         TM    PCBIOCMP(PCBPTR),B'00000001'                        0220 00625000
         BNO   @RF00220                                            0220 00626000
*             DO;                   /* I/O IS COMPLETE, SO PERHAPS 0221 00627000
*                                      CAN FREE THE FRAME. IF THE I/O   00628000
*                                      IS COMPLETE, THERE MUST HAVE     00629000
*                                      BEEN AN I/O ERROR.            */ 00630000
*               IF PCBCQN=PCBCIOQN&PCBRLPA=0 THEN/* IF THE PCB IS A     00631000
*                                      PRIMARY WITH NO RELATEDS THE     00632000
*                                      PFTE CAN BE FREED.            */ 00633000
         CLI   PCBCQN(PCBPTR),32                                   0222 00634000
         BNE   @RF00222                                            0222 00635000
         L     @07,PCBRLPA-1(,PCBPTR)                              0222 00636000
         LA    @07,0(,@07)                                         0222 00637000
         LTR   @07,@07                                             0222 00638000
         BNZ   @RF00222                                            0222 00639000
*                 DO;               /* FREE THE PFTE.                */ 00640000
*                   RESPECIFY                                      0224 00641000
*                    (R0) RESTRICTED;                              0224 00642000
*                   PFTPCBSI='0'B;  /* NO PAGING ACTIVE FOR THE FRAME*/ 00643000
         NI    PFTPCBSI(PFTEPTR),B'11110111'                       0225 00644000
*                   R0=PCBRBN;      /* GET THE RBN                   */ 00645000
         LH    R0,PCBRBN(,PCBPTR)                                  0226 00646000
         N     R0,@CF02318                                         0226 00647000
*                   R0=PFTECON|R0;  /* SET UP INPUT REG TO PFTE    0227 00648000
*                                      ENQ/DEQ TO PUT PFTE AT HEAD OF   00649000
*                                      AFQ                           */ 00650000
         O     R0,@CF02179                                         0227 00651000
*/********************************************************************/ 00652000
*/*                                                                  */ 00653000
*/*                     PFTE ENQ/DEQ                                 */ 00654000
*/*                   INPUT:                                         */ 00655000
*/*              R0: TQN (FOR THE AFQ) AND RBN                       */ 00656000
*/*              R1: UNUSED                                          */ 00657000
*/*              R2: ADDRESS OF RSMHD                                */ 00658000
*/*              R3: ADDRESS OF PVT                                  */ 00659000
*/*              R4 - R13: UNUSED                                    */ 00660000
*/*              R14: RETURN ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR                  */ 00661000
*/*              R15: ENTRY POINT ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR             */ 00662000
*/*                   OUTPUT:                                        */ 00663000
*/*              R0 - R15: RESTORED                                  */ 00664000
*/*                                                                  */ 00665000
*/********************************************************************/ 00666000
*                                                                  0228 00667000
*                   CALL IEAVPFTE;  /* CALL PFTE ENQ/DEQ TO PUT PFTE    00668000
*                                      AT HEAD OF AFQ                */ 00669000
         L     @15,PVTPFTE(,PVTPTR)                                0228 00670000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0228 00671000
*                   RESPECIFY                                      0229 00672000
*                    (R0,                                          0229 00673000
*                     PFTEPTR) UNRESTRICTED;                       0229 00674000
*                 END;                                             0230 00675000
*               RMWAFREE='1'B;      /* FREE THE PCB SINCE I/O HAS  0231 00676000
*                                      COMPLETED.                    */ 00677000
@RF00222 OI    RMWAFREE(RMWAPTR),B'00010000'                       0231 00678000
*             END;                                                 0232 00679000
*           ELSE                    /* I/O IS NOT COMPLETE.          */ 00680000
*             PCBFREAL='1'B;        /* SET FLAG TO FREE THE FRAME  0233 00681000
*                                      WHEN THE I/O IS COMPLETE.     */ 00682000
         B     @RC00220                                            0233 00683000
@RF00220 OI    PCBFREAL(PCBPTR),B'10000000'                        0233 00684000
*           IF PCBCQN=PCBDEQN THEN  /* TEST IF THE PCB IS A RELATED. */ 00685000
@RC00220 CLI   PCBCQN(PCBPTR),255                                  0234 00686000
         BNE   @RF00234                                            0234 00687000
*             RMWAFREE='1'B;        /* IS A RELATED. SET FLAG TO FREE   00688000
*                                      IT.                           */ 00689000
         OI    RMWAFREE(RMWAPTR),B'00010000'                       0235 00690000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0236 00691000
*            (PCBRPTR) RESTRICTED;                                 0236 00692000
@RF00234 DS    0H                                                  0237 00693000
*           PCBRPTR=PCBRTPA;        /* GET THE SWAP IN ROOT PCB ADDR */ 00694000
         L     PCBRPTR,PCBRTPA-1(,PCBPTR)                          0237 00695000
         LA    PCBRPTR,0(,PCBRPTR)                                 0237 00696000
*           PCBRTPA=0;              /* ZERO THE ROOT PCB POINTER.    */ 00697000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0238 00698000
         STCM  @15,7,PCBRTPA(PCBPTR)                               0238 00699000
*           PCBRCNT=PCBRCNT-1;      /* DECREMENT THE ROOT COUNT.     */ 00700000
         LH    @14,PCBRCNT(,PCBRPTR)                               0239 00701000
         BCTR  @14,0                                               0239 00702000
         STH   @14,PCBRCNT(,PCBRPTR)                               0239 00703000
*           IF PCBRCNT=0 THEN       /* IF ROOT COUNT GOES TO ZERO, 0240 00704000
*                                      ALL SWAP IN I/O IS COMPLETE OR   00705000
*                                      PURGED. CALL THE ROOT EXIT.   */ 00706000
         CR    @14,@15                                             0240 00707000
         BNE   @RF00240                                            0240 00708000
*             DO;                   /* CALL THE ROOT EXIT.           */ 00709000
*               RESPECIFY                                          0242 00710000
*                (R1) RESTRICTED;                                  0242 00711000
*               R1=PCBRPTR;         /* GET THE ROOT PCB ADDRESS.     */ 00712000
         LR    R1,PCBRPTR                                          0243 00713000
*               CALL ROOTEXIT;      /* CALL THE SWAP IN ROOT EXIT.   */ 00714000
         L     @15,PCBRGOTO(,PCBRPTR)                              0244 00715000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0244 00716000
*               RCACSECT=RCACPTRM;  /* RESET THE CSECT ID            */ 00717000
         L     @15,PVTPRCA(,PVTPTR)                                0245 00718000
         MVI   RCACSECT(@15),X'11'                                 0245 00719000
*               RESPECIFY                                          0246 00720000
*                (R1,                                              0246 00721000
*                 PCBRPTR) UNRESTRICTED;                           0246 00722000
*             END;                                                 0247 00723000
*         END;                      /* END COMMON AREA FIX SWAP INS. */ 00724000
@RF00240 DS    0H                                                  0249 00725000
*       IF RMWAFREE='1'B THEN       /* TEST IF PCB IS TO BE FREED.   */ 00726000
@RF00204 TM    RMWAFREE(RMWAPTR),B'00010000'                       0249 00727000
         BO    @RT00249                                            0249 00728000
*         GOTO FREEAPCB;            /* GO FREE THE PCB.              */ 00729000
*       ELSE                        /* DO NOT FREE THE PCB.          */ 00730000
*         GOTO NEXTPCB;             /* GET THE NEXT PCB TO PROCESS.  */ 00731000
         B     NEXTPCB                                             0251 00732000
*     END;                          /* END WRONG ASCB ADDRESS.       */ 00733000
*                                                                  0253 00734000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00735000
*   /*                                                               */ 00736000
*   /* THE PCB IS FOR THE ADDRESS SPACE FOR WHICH THE PURGE IS TO BE */ 00737000
*   /* DONE. IF ASCB PURGE DO SOME SPECIAL PROCESSING, THEN GO TO THE*/ 00738000
*   /* REGULAR PURGE SECTION.                                        */ 00739000
*   /*                                                               */ 00740000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00741000
*                                                                  0253 00742000
*                                                                  0253 00743000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00744000
*   /*                                                               */ 00745000
*   /* WHEN THE PCB TRACE IS ACTIVE, THE FOLLOWING BRANCH INSTRUCTIO */ 00746000
*   /* N MUST BE NOOPED                                      @Z40WPYD*/ 00747000
*   /*                                                               */ 00748000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00749000
*                                                                  0253 00750000
*TRACEZT1:                                                         0253 00751000
*   GENERATE REFS(PCBPTR) SETS(R13);                               0253 00752000
@RF00202 DS    0H                                                  0253 00753000
TRACEZT1 DS    0H                                                  0253 00754000
         B     TRACEZT1+16                                              00755000
         L     R13,68(PCBPTR)                                           00756000
*   R13=R13+MYID;                                                  0254 00757000
         AL    R13,@CF02181                                        0254 00758000
*   GENERATE REFS(PCBPTR) SETS(R13);                               0255 00759000
         ST    R13,68(PCBPTR)                                           00760000
*   IF RMPLTERM='1'B THEN           /* TEST FOR ASCB PURGE. IF SO, 0256 00761000
*                                      SRB RESETS MAY NEED TO BE DONE*/ 00762000
         TM    RMPLTERM(RMPLPTR),B'01000000'                       0256 00763000
         BNO   @RF00256                                            0256 00764000
*     DO;                           /* IS ASCB PURGE, SO RESET ANY 0257 00765000
*                                      SRBS SINCE THEY WOULD       0257 00766000
*                                      OTHERWISE NEVER BE RESET AND     00767000
*                                      PURGED                        */ 00768000
*       IF(PCBSRBMD='1'B&PCBRESET='1'B) THEN/* TEST IF THIS PCB IS 0258 00769000
*                                      FOR A SRB WHICH MUST BE RESET */ 00770000
         TM    PCBSRBMD(PCBPTR),B'00100000'                        0258 00771000
         BNO   @RF00258                                            0258 00772000
         TM    PCBRESET(PCBPTR),B'00010000'                        0258 00773000
         BNO   @RF00258                                            0258 00774000
*         CALL RSETSUBR;            /* SRB MUST BE RESET, SO RESET IT*/ 00775000
         BAL   @14,RSETSUBR                                        0259 00776000
*       GOTO PURGEPCB;              /* GO PROCESS THE PCB            */ 00777000
         B     PURGEPCB                                            0260 00778000
*     END;                                                         0261 00779000
*                                                                  0261 00780000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00781000
*   /*                                                               */ 00782000
*   /* MUST BE TCB OR RB PURGE TO BE HERE. IF TCB PURGE, TEST THAT   */ 00783000
*   /* THE PCB IS FOR THE TCB BEING PURGED.                          */ 00784000
*   /*                                                               */ 00785000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00786000
*                                                                  0262 00787000
*   IF RMPLRBPP='0'B THEN           /* TEST FOR TCB PURGE (MUST BE 0262 00788000
*                                      TCB OR RB PURGE )             */ 00789000
@RF00256 TM    RMPLRBPP(RMPLPTR),B'00100000'                       0262 00790000
         BNZ   @RF00262                                            0262 00791000
*     DO;                           /* IS TCB PURGE, SO CHECK THAT 0263 00792000
*                                      THE TCB IS THE ONE TO BE    0263 00793000
*                                      PURGED                        */ 00794000
*       IF(PCBROOT='0'B&PCBRTPA¬=RMPLTCBA)|                        0264 00795000
*                                                                  0264 00796000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00797000
*       /*                                                           */ 00798000
*       /* TEST FOR NO ROOT PCB AND THE TCB ADDRESS IS FOR THE TCB   */ 00799000
*       /* BEING PURGED.                                             */ 00800000
*       /*                                                           */ 00801000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00802000
*                                                                  0264 00803000
*           (PCBROOT='1'B&PCBRTPA->PCBRTCBA¬=RMPLTCBA) THEN/* TEST IF   00804000
*                                      A ROOT PCB EXISTS AND THE TCB    00805000
*                                      ADDRESS IN THE ROOT PCB IS FOR   00806000
*                                      THE TCB BEING PURGED.         */ 00807000
         TM    PCBROOT(PCBPTR),B'00000100'                         0264 00808000
         BNZ   @GL00005                                            0264 00809000
         L     @04,PCBRTPA-1(,PCBPTR)                              0264 00810000
         LA    @04,0(,@04)                                         0264 00811000
         C     @04,RMPLTCBA(,RMPLPTR)                              0264 00812000
         BNE   @RT00264                                            0264 00813000
@GL00005 TM    PCBROOT(PCBPTR),B'00000100'                         0264 00814000
         BNO   @RF00264                                            0264 00815000
         L     @04,PCBRTPA-1(,PCBPTR)                              0264 00816000
         L     @04,PCBRTCBA-1(,@04)                                0264 00817000
         LA    @04,0(,@04)                                         0264 00818000
         C     @04,RMPLTCBA(,RMPLPTR)                              0264 00819000
         BNE   @RT00264                                            0264 00820000
*         GOTO NEXTPCB;             /* PCB IS NOT FOR THE TCB BEING     00821000
*                                      01* DESCRIPTIVE-NAME = PAGING    00822000
*                                      TERMINATION SERVICES PURGED,     00823000
*                                      SO GO GET THE NEXT PCB TO BE     00824000
*                                      PROCESSED                     */ 00825000
*       ELSE                        /* ABOVE TEST FALSE.             */ 00826000
*         GOTO PURGEPCB;            /* GO TO THE PCB PROCESSOR       */ 00827000
         B     PURGEPCB                                            0266 00828000
*     END;                                                         0267 00829000
*                                                                  0267 00830000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00831000
*   /*                                                               */ 00832000
*   /* MUST BE A RB PURGE TO BE HERE                                 */ 00833000
*   /*                                                               */ 00834000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00835000
*                                                                  0268 00836000
*   IF PCBSRB=RMPLRBPA THEN         /* TEST IF THE RB IN THE PCB IS     00837000
*                                      FOR THE RB BEING PURGED       */ 00838000
@RF00262 CLC   PCBSRB(4,PCBPTR),RMPLRBPA(RMPLPTR)                  0268 00839000
         BNE   @RF00268                                            0268 00840000
*     DO;                           /* PCB IS FOR THE RB BEING     0269 00841000
*                                      PURGED. RESET IF NECESSARY, 0269 00842000
*                                      THEN GO PROCESS THE PCB.      */ 00843000
*       CALL RSETSUBR;              /* RESET THE SUSPENDED RB        */ 00844000
         BAL   @14,RSETSUBR                                        0270 00845000
*       GOTO PURGEPCB;              /* GO PROCESS THE PCB.           */ 00846000
         B     PURGEPCB                                            0271 00847000
*     END;                                                         0272 00848000
*   ELSE                            /* PCB IS NOT FOR THE RB BEING 0273 00849000
*                                      PURGED, SO GO GET THE NEXT PCB*/ 00850000
*     GOTO NEXTPCB;                 /* GO GET NEXT PCB               */ 00851000
*PURGEPCB:                                                         0274 00852000
*                                                                  0274 00853000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00854000
*   /*                                                               */ 00855000
*   /* IF HERE, THE PCB IS FOR THE FUNCTION BEING PURGED.            */ 00856000
*   /*                                                               */ 00857000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00858000
*                                                                  0274 00859000
*   IF RMWAGFAD='1'B THEN           /* TEST FOR PROCESSING THE GFA 0274 00860000
*                                      DEFER QUEUE                   */ 00861000
PURGEPCB TM    RMWAGFAD(RMWAPTR),B'10000000'                       0274 00862000
         BNO   @RF00274                                            0274 00863000
*     DO;                           /* ARE PROCESSING THE GFA QUEUE. */ 00864000
*       IF PCBCQN=PCBDEFRN&PCBRLPA=0&(RMPLTERM='0'B|PCBVBN>=PVTLCSA)    00865000
*         THEN                      /* TEST FOR A GFA PRIMARY PCB  0276 00866000
*                                      WITH NO RELATED PCBS AND    0276 00867000
*                                      EITHER COMMON AREA VBN OR   0276 00868000
*                                      VTERM IS IN THE CORRECT     0276 00869000
*                                      ADDRESS SPACE TO REFERENCE THE   00870000
*                                      XPTE.                 @VS01972*/ 00871000
         CLI   PCBCQN(PCBPTR),24                                   0276 00872000
         BNE   @RF00276                                            0276 00873000
         L     @04,PCBRLPA-1(,PCBPTR)                              0276 00874000
         LA    @04,0(,@04)                                         0276 00875000
         LTR   @04,@04                                             0276 00876000
         BNZ   @RF00276                                            0276 00877000
         TM    RMPLTERM(RMPLPTR),B'01000000'                       0276 00878000
         BZ    @RT00276                                            0276 00879000
         CLC   PCBVBN(2,PCBPTR),PVTLCSA(PVTPTR)                    0276 00880000
         BL    @RF00276                                            0276 00881000
@RT00276 DS    0H                                                  0277 00882000
*         XPTDEFER='0'B;            /* IS NO PCB RELATED TO THIS   0277 00883000
*                                      PRIM. WHEN PCB IS FREED, XPT     00884000
*                                      BIT MUST BE OFF.              */ 00885000
         L     @04,PCBXPTA-1(,PCBPTR)                              0277 00886000
         NI    XPTDEFER(@04),B'11111101'                           0277 00887000
*       IF PCBROOT='1'B THEN        /* TEST FOR A ROOT PCB           */ 00888000
@RF00276 TM    PCBROOT(PCBPTR),B'00000100'                         0278 00889000
         BNO   @RF00278                                            0278 00890000
*         CALL ROOTPURG;            /* A ROOT PCB EXISTS, SO CALL  0279 00891000
*                                      SUBROUTINE TO PROCESS THE ROOT   00892000
*                                      PCB                           */ 00893000
         BAL   @14,ROOTPURG                                        0279 00894000
*     END;                          /* FALL THROUGH TO FREE GFAD PCB */ 00895000
*   ELSE                            /* PCB IS NOT ON GFA DEFER QUEUE,   00896000
*                                      SO MUST BE ON I/O ACTIVE. CALL   00897000
*                                      I/O PURGE PROCESSORS          */ 00898000
*     DO;                           /* PROCESS THE I/O ACTIVE PCB    */ 00899000
         B     @RC00274                                            0281 00900000
@RF00274 DS    0H                                                  0282 00901000
*       CALL TERMIO;                /* CALL I/O PURGE ROUTINE        */ 00902000
         BAL   @14,TERMIO                                          0282 00903000
*       IF RMWAFREE='0'B THEN       /* TEST IF PCB MUST REMAIN ON I/O   00904000
*                                      ACTIVE QUEUE FOR THE I/O TO 0283 00905000
*                                      COMPLETE                      */ 00906000
         TM    RMWAFREE(RMWAPTR),B'00010000'                       0283 00907000
         BNZ   @RF00283                                            0283 00908000
*         IF RMPLRBPP='1'B THEN     /* TEST FOR RB PURGE. IF SO,HAVE    00909000
*                                      PROCESSED THE ONLY PCB FOR THE   00910000
*                                      RB. SO EXIT.                  */ 00911000
         TM    RMPLRBPP(RMPLPTR),B'00100000'                       0284 00912000
         BO    @RT00284                                            0284 00913000
*           GOTO EXITPGQ;           /* GO TO THE EXIT POINT.         */ 00914000
*         ELSE                      /* NOT RB PURGE, SO GET NEXT PCB    00915000
*                                      AND CONTINUE PROCESSING.      */ 00916000
*           GOTO NEXTPCB;           /* PCB MUST REMAIN. DO NOT FREE     00917000
*                                      IT. GO GET THE NEXT PCB       */ 00918000
         B     NEXTPCB                                             0286 00919000
*     END;                                                         0287 00920000
@RF00283 DS    0H                                                  0288 00921000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0288 00922000
*    (BACKPCB) RESTRICTED;                                         0288 00923000
*                                                                  0288 00924000
@RC00274 DS    0H                                                  0289 00925000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00926000
*   /*                                                               */ 00927000
*   /* THIS ROUTINE WILL FREE THE PRESENT PCB                        */ 00928000
*   /*                                                               */ 00929000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00930000
*                                                                  0289 00931000
*FREEAPCB:                                                         0289 00932000
*   IF PCBCQN=PCBDEQN THEN          /* TEST IF THE PCB TO BE FREED IS   00933000
*                                      A RELATED PCB                 */ 00934000
FREEAPCB CLI   PCBCQN(PCBPTR),255                                  0289 00935000
         BNE   @RF00289                                            0289 00936000
*     IF PCBRLPA¬=0 THEN            /* IS A RELATED PCB. TEST IF   0290 00937000
*                                      THERE ARE MORE RELATEDS FOR 0290 00938000
*                                      THIS PCB                      */ 00939000
         L     @15,PCBRLPA-1(,PCBPTR)                              0290 00940000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0290 00941000
         LTR   @15,@15                                             0290 00942000
         BZ    @RF00290                                            0290 00943000
*       DO;                         /* ARE MORE RELATED PCBS. FREE 0291 00944000
*                                      THIS PCB                      */ 00945000
*         BACKPCB=ADDR(RELPCB->PCBRLP);/* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE   0292 00946000
*                                      FIELD THAT WILL POINT TO THE     00947000
*                                      NEXT PCB TO BE PROCESSED AFTER   00948000
*                                      THE PRESENT PCB IS FREED      */ 00949000
         LA    BACKPCB,PCBRLP(,RELPCB)                             0292 00950000
*         CALL FREEPCB;             /* CALL SUBROUTINE TO FREE THE 0293 00951000
*                                      PRESENT PCB                   */ 00952000
         BAL   @14,FREEPCB                                         0293 00953000
*       END;                                                       0294 00954000
*     ELSE                          /* IS THE LAST RELATED PCB ON THE   00955000
*                                      CHAIN. SET UP FREE OF PCB     */ 00956000
*       DO;                         /* SET UP POINTERS TO GET THE  0295 00957000
*                                      NEXT PCB TO BE PROCESSED      */ 00958000
         B     @RC00290                                            0295 00959000
@RF00290 DS    0H                                                  0296 00960000
*         BACKPCB=PRIPCB;           /* POINTER TO THE POINTER TO THE    00961000
*                                      NEXT PCB POINTS TO THE NEXT 0296 00962000
*                                      PRIMARY PCB                   */ 00963000
         LR    BACKPCB,PRIPCB                                      0296 00964000
*         CALL FREEPCB;             /* FREE THE PRESENT PCB          */ 00965000
         BAL   @14,FREEPCB                                         0297 00966000
*         RELPCB=0;                 /* SET THE POINTER TO THE LAST 0298 00967000
*                                      RELATED PCB TO NO RELATED     */ 00968000
         SLR   RELPCB,RELPCB                                       0298 00969000
*       END;                                                       0299 00970000
*   ELSE                            /* PCB IS A PRIMARY PCB. FREE IT.*/ 00971000
*     DO;                                                          0300 00972000
         B     @RC00289                                            0300 00973000
@RF00289 DS    0H                                                  0301 00974000
*       BACKPCB=PRIPCB;             /* GET ADDRESS OF THE FIELD WHICH   00975000
*                                      WILL POINT TO THE NEW FIRST 0301 00976000
*                                      PCB ON THE QUEUE WHEN THE   0301 00977000
*                                      PRESENT PCB IS FREED          */ 00978000
         LR    BACKPCB,PRIPCB                                      0301 00979000
*       CALL FREEPCB;               /* CALL SUBROUTINE TO FREE THE 0302 00980000
*                                      PRESENT PCB                   */ 00981000
         BAL   @14,FREEPCB                                         0302 00982000
*     END;                                                         0303 00983000
*   IF RMPLRBPP='1'B THEN           /* TEST FOR RB PURGE TYPE.       */ 00984000
@RC00289 TM    RMPLRBPP(RMPLPTR),B'00100000'                       0304 00985000
         BO    @RT00304                                            0304 00986000
*     GOTO EXITPGQ;                 /* IS RB PURGE. THERE CAN BE ONLY   00987000
*                                      ONE PCB ACTIVE FOR A RB. SINCE   00988000
*                                      IT WAS JUST PURGED, EXIT.     */ 00989000
*   PCBPTR=BACKPCB->NEXTPCBA;       /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE NEXT 0306 00990000
*                                      PCB TO BE PROCESSED           */ 00991000
         L     PCBPTR,NEXTPCBA-1(,BACKPCB)                         0306 00992000
         LA    PCBPTR,0(,PCBPTR)                                   0306 00993000
*   RMWAFREE='0'B;                  /* TURN OFF INTERNAL FREE FLAG   */ 00994000
         NI    RMWAFREE(RMWAPTR),B'11101111'                       0307 00995000
*   GOTO TESTPCB;                   /* GO SEE IF NEW PCB IS TO BE  0308 00996000
*                                      PROCESSED                     */ 00997000
         B     TESTPCB                                             0308 00998000
*                                                                  0309 00999000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01000000
*   /*                                                               */ 01001000
*   /* EXIT POINT FOR TERMPGQ SUBROUTINE.                            */ 01002000
*   /*                                                               */ 01003000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01004000
*                                                                  0309 01005000
*EXITPGQ:                                                          0309 01006000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0309 01007000
*    (R14) RESTRICTED;                                             0309 01008000
EXITPGQ  DS    0H                                                  0310 01009000
*   R14=RMWALVL1;                   /* GET THE RETURN ADDRESS        */ 01010000
         L     R14,RMWALVL1(,RMWAPTR)                              0310 01011000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0311 01012000
*    (BACKPCB,                                                     0311 01013000
*     PCBPTR,                                                      0311 01014000
*     RELPCB,                                                      0311 01015000
*     PRIPCB,                                                      0311 01016000
*     R14) UNRESTRICTED;                                           0311 01017000
*   END TERMPGQ;                                                   0312 01018000
@EL00002 DS    0H                                                  0312 01019000
@EF00002 DS    0H                                                  0312 01020000
@ER00002 BR    @14                                                 0312 01021000
*                                                                  0313 01022000
*/********************************************************************/ 01023000
*/*                                                                  */ 01024000
*/* THIS SUBROUTINE IS CALLED BY THE PAGING PURGE ROUTINE TO PROCESS */ 01025000
*/* PCBS TO BE PURGED FOUND ON AN I/O ACTIVE QUEUE. EACH PCB FOUND IS*/ 01026000
*/* PROCESSED, THEN CONTROL RETURNS TO THE PAGING PURGE MAINLINE TO  */ 01027000
*/* CONTINUE THE QUEUE SCAN. IF THE PCB HAS A ROOT PCB, IT IS FIRST  */ 01028000
*/* PROCESSED. IF THE ROOT PCB IS FOR OUTPUT, IT MUST BE A SWAP OUT  */ 01029000
*/* ROOT, AND DOES NOT NEED TO BE PROCESSED. RETURN IS MADE TO THE   */ 01030000
*/* MAINLINE. IF THE ROOT IS FOR INPUT, THE INTERNAL ROOT PURGE      */ 01031000
*/* SUBROUTINE IS CALLED TO PROCESS AND GET RID OF THE ROOT PCB.     */ 01032000
*/* IF THE PCB IS A RELATED PCB, IT IS MARKED TO BE FREED WITHOUT    */ 01033000
*/* FURTHER PROCESSING AND RETURN IS MADE TO THE CALLING PROCESSOR.  */ 01034000
*/* IF NOT A RELATED AND THE I/O IS COMPLETE, THE PFTE IS FREED IF   */ 01035000
*/* POSSIBLE. RETURN IS MADE TO THE CALLER. IF THE I/O IS NOT        */ 01036000
*/* COMPLETE, THE PCB IS MARKED TO FREE THE PFTE WHEN THE I/O DOES   */ 01037000
*/* COMPLETE. ALSO, IF THE PCB IS ON THE LOCAL I/O QUEUE AND THE     */ 01038000
*/* ADDRESS SPACE IS BEING PURGED, THE PCB IS ZEROED. THIS IS TO     */ 01039000
*/* PREVENT RELATED PROCESSING WHILE THE PCB IS ON THE LOCAL I/O     */ 01040000
*/* QUEUE OF ANOTHER ADDRESS SPACE.                                  */ 01041000
*/*                                                                  */ 01042000
*/********************************************************************/ 01043000
*                                                                  0313 01044000
*TERMIO:                                                           0313 01045000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               0313 01046000
TERMIO   DS    0H                                                  0314 01047000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0314 01048000
*    (RELPCB,                                                      0314 01049000
*     PCBPTR,                                                      0314 01050000
*     PRIPCB,                                                      0314 01051000
*     R14) RESTRICTED;                                             0314 01052000
*   RMWALVL2=R14;                   /* SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS       */ 01053000
         ST    R14,RMWALVL2(,RMWAPTR)                              0315 01054000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0316 01055000
*    (R14) UNRESTRICTED;                                           0316 01056000
*   IF PCBROOT='1'B THEN            /* TEST IF A ROOT PCB EXISTS.    */ 01057000
         TM    PCBROOT(PCBPTR),B'00000100'                         0317 01058000
         BNO   @RF00317                                            0317 01059000
*     IF PCBIOI='0'B THEN           /* A ROOT EXISTS. PROCESS      0318 01060000
*                                      ACCORDING TO INPUT OR OUTPUT. */ 01061000
         TM    PCBIOI(PCBPTR),B'00000010'                          0318 01062000
         BNZ   @RF00318                                            0318 01063000
*       CALL ROOTPURG;              /* FOR INPUT ROOT, CALL ROOT   0319 01064000
*                                      HANDLER SUBROUTINE.           */ 01065000
         BAL   @14,ROOTPURG                                        0319 01066000
*     ELSE                          /* OUTPUT ROOT CAN ONLY BE FOR A    01067000
*                                      SWAP OUT.                     */ 01068000
*       GOTO LEAVEPCB;              /* ONLY WAY TO FIND A SWAP OUT 0320 01069000
*                                      PCB IS IF I/O IS NOT COMPLETE.   01070000
*                                      MUST BE LEFT ON THE I/O ACTIVE   01071000
*                                      QUEUE                         */ 01072000
*   IF PCBCQN=PCBDEQN THEN          /* TEST FOR A QUEUED PCB.        */ 01073000
@RF00317 CLI   PCBCQN(PCBPTR),255                                  0321 01074000
         BE    @RT00321                                            0321 01075000
*     GOTO FREEBIT;                 /* IS NOT A QUEUED PCB. ALL    0322 01076000
*                                      RELATED PCBS CAN BE FREED. GO    01077000
*                                      TURN ON FREE FLAG BIT.        */ 01078000
*   IF PCBIOCMP='1'B THEN           /* IS A QUEUED PCB. TEST FOR I/O    01079000
*                                      COMPLETE.                     */ 01080000
         TM    PCBIOCMP(PCBPTR),B'00000001'                        0323 01081000
         BNO   @RF00323                                            0323 01082000
*     DO;                           /* I/O IS DONE. CAN FREE THE   0324 01083000
*                                      FRAME UNDER CERTAIN         0324 01084000
*                                      CONDITIONS.                   */ 01085000
*       IF PCBRLPA=0 THEN           /* TEST FOR NO RELATED REQUESTS. */ 01086000
         L     @04,PCBRLPA-1(,PCBPTR)                              0325 01087000
         LA    @04,0(,@04)                                         0325 01088000
         LTR   @04,@04                                             0325 01089000
         BNZ   @RF00325                                            0325 01090000
*         DO;                       /* ARE NO RELATED REQUESTS. CAN     01091000
*                                      FREE THE FRAME.               */ 01092000
*           IF PCBIOERR='0'B THEN   /* TEST FOR NO I/O ERROR.        */ 01093000
         TM    PCBIOERR(PCBPTR),B'00100000'                        0327 01094000
         BNZ   @RF00327                                            0327 01095000
*             IF PCBCQN=PCBCIOQN|PCBVBN=0 THEN/* IF COMMON AREA FRAME   01096000
*                                      OR ZERO VBN IN THE PCB, THE 0328 01097000
*                                      FRAME HAS BEEN DISPOSED OF.   */ 01098000
         CLI   PCBCQN(PCBPTR),32                                   0328 01099000
         BE    @RT00328                                            0328 01100000
         LH    @04,PCBVBN(,PCBPTR)                                 0328 01101000
         N     @04,@CF02318                                        0328 01102000
         LTR   @04,@04                                             0328 01103000
         BZ    @RT00328                                            0328 01104000
*               GOTO FREEBIT;       /* NO FRAME TO DO, SO GO FREE THE   01105000
*                                      PCB.                          */ 01106000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0330 01107000
*            (PFTEPTR) RESTRICTED;                                 0330 01108000
@RF00327 DS    0H                                                  0331 01109000
*           PFTEPTR=PVTPFTP+PCBRBN; /* GET THE PFTE ADDR             */ 01110000
         LH    PFTEPTR,PCBRBN(,PCBPTR)                             0331 01111000
         N     PFTEPTR,@CF02318                                    0331 01112000
         AL    PFTEPTR,PVTPFTP(,PVTPTR)                            0331 01113000
*           PFTPCBSI='0'B;          /* NO PAGING CURRENTLY ACTIVE.   */ 01114000
         NI    PFTPCBSI(PFTEPTR),B'11110111'                       0332 01115000
*           IF PCBIOERR='1'B THEN   /* TEST FOR I/O ERROR.           */ 01116000
         TM    PCBIOERR(PCBPTR),B'00100000'                        0333 01117000
         BNO   @RF00333                                            0333 01118000
*             PFTPGID=0;            /* I/O ERROR OCCURRED. ZERO THE     01119000
*                                      PGID TO PREVENT RECLAIM.      */ 01120000
         SLR   @07,@07                                             0334 01121000
         ST    @07,PFTPGID(,PFTEPTR)                               0334 01122000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0335 01123000
*            (R0) RESTRICTED;                                      0335 01124000
@RF00333 DS    0H                                                  0336 01125000
*           R0=PCBRBN;              /* GET THE RBN.                  */ 01126000
         LH    R0,PCBRBN(,PCBPTR)                                  0336 01127000
         N     R0,@CF02318                                         0336 01128000
*           R0=PFTECON|R0;          /* SET UP THE IEAVPFTE INTERFACE.*/ 01129000
         O     R0,@CF02179                                         0337 01130000
