*/********************************************************************/ 01131000
*/*                                                                  */ 01132000
*/*                  PFTE ENQ/DEQ                                    */ 01133000
*/*                INPUT:                                            */ 01134000
*/*           R0: TQN (FOR THE AFQ) AND RBN                          */ 01135000
*/*           R1: UNUSED                                             */ 01136000
*/*           R2: ADDRESS OF RSMHD                                   */ 01137000
*/*           R3: ADDRESS OF PVT                                     */ 01138000
*/*           R4 - R13: UNUSED                                       */ 01139000
*/*           R14: RETURN ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR                     */ 01140000
*/*           R15: ENTRY POINT ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR                */ 01141000
*/*                OUTPUT:                                           */ 01142000
*/*           R0 - R15: RESTORED                                     */ 01143000
*/*                                                                  */ 01144000
*/********************************************************************/ 01145000
*                                                                  0338 01146000
*           CALL IEAVPFTE;          /* CALL PFTE ENQ/DEQ TO PUT PFTE    01147000
*                                      AT HEAD OF AFQ                */ 01148000
         L     @15,PVTPFTE(,PVTPTR)                                0338 01149000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0338 01150000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0339 01151000
*            (R0,                                                  0339 01152000
*             PFTEPTR) UNRESTRICTED;                               0339 01153000
*         END;                      /* END FREEING OF PFTE.          */ 01154000
*FREEBIT:                                                          0341 01155000
*       RMWAFREE='1'B;              /* SET FLAG TO FREE THE PCB IN 0341 01156000
*                                      THE MAINLINE.                 */ 01157000
@RF00325 DS    0H                                                  0341 01158000
FREEBIT  OI    RMWAFREE(RMWAPTR),B'00010000'                       0341 01159000
*     END;                          /* END I/O COMPLETE PROCESSING.  */ 01160000
*   ELSE                            /* I/O IS NOT COMPLETE.          */ 01161000
*     DO;                           /* PCB MUST REMAIN FOR THE I/O TO   01162000
*                                      COMPLETE.                     */ 01163000
         B     @RC00323                                            0343 01164000
@RF00323 DS    0H                                                  0344 01165000
*       PCBFREAL='1'B;              /* SET FLAG TO FREE THE REAL   0344 01166000
*                                      FRAME                         */ 01167000
*       PCBRESET='0'B;              /* TURN OFF RESET FLAG (ON TCB OR   01168000
*                                      ASCB PURGE, ROUTINE WILL NEVER   01169000
*                                      RUN AGAIN, SO A RESET DOES NOT   01170000
*                                      NEED TO BE DONE)              */ 01171000
         OI    PCBFREAL(PCBPTR),B'10000000'                        0345 01172000
         NI    PCBRESET(PCBPTR),B'11101111'                        0345 01173000
*       IF RMWALIOQ='1'B&RMPLTERM='1'B THEN/* TEST FOR THE LOCAL I/O    01174000
*                                      QUEUE BEING PROCESSED AND ASCB   01175000
*                                      PURGE.                        */ 01176000
         TM    RMWALIOQ(RMWAPTR),B'00100000'                       0346 01177000
         BNO   @RF00346                                            0346 01178000
         TM    RMPLTERM(RMPLPTR),B'01000000'                       0346 01179000
         BNO   @RF00346                                            0346 01180000
*         DO;                       /* ZERO THE VBN SO THAT WHEN THE    01181000
*                                      PCBS ARE MOVED TO M.S. LIOQ,     01182000
*                                      THERE WILL NOT BE TWO OF THE     01183000
*                                      SAME VBN.                     */ 01184000
*LEAVEPCB:                                                         0348 01185000
*           PCBVBN=0;               /* ZERO THE VBN IN THE PCB. IF 0348 01186000
*                                      THE PCB IS MOVED TO MASTERS 0348 01187000
*                                      LIOQ, NO TWO QUEUED PCBS WILL    01188000
*                                      HAVE THE SAME VBN.            */ 01189000
LEAVEPCB SLR   @04,@04                                             0348 01190000
         STH   @04,PCBVBN(,PCBPTR)                                 0348 01191000
*         END;                                                     0349 01192000
*       ELSE                                                       0350 01193000
*         DO;                       /* PCB IS FOR COMMON AREA      0350 01194000
*                                                            @Z40WPYD*/ 01195000
         B     @RC00346                                            0350 01196000
@RF00346 DS    0H                                                  0351 01197000
*           IF RMPLTERM='1'B THEN                                  0351 01198000
*                                                                  0351 01199000
         TM    RMPLTERM(RMPLPTR),B'01000000'                       0351 01200000
         BNO   @RF00351                                            0351 01201000
*/* IF THIS IS A COMMON AREA PCB WITH I/O INCOMPLETE AND THE       0352 01202000
*   PURGE TYPE IS ASCB, THEN MASTER'S ASCB ADDRESS MUST BE PUT IN  0352 01203000
*   PCBASCB.                                  @Z40WPYD               */ 01204000
*                                                                  0352 01205000
*             PCBASCB=PSAAOLD;      /* PUT MASTER'S ASCB ADDRESS IN     01206000
*                                      PCB                   @Z40WPYD*/ 01207000
         L     @04,PSAAOLD                                         0352 01208000
         ST    @04,PCBASCB(,PCBPTR)                                0352 01209000
*         END;                                                     0353 01210000
@RF00351 DS    0H                                                  0354 01211000
*     END;                                                         0354 01212000
*                                                                  0354 01213000
@RC00346 DS    0H                                                  0355 01214000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01215000
*   /*                                                               */ 01216000
*   /* EXIT POINT FOR TERMIO SUBROUTINE                              */ 01217000
*   /*                                                               */ 01218000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01219000
*                                                                  0355 01220000
*EXITIO:                                                           0355 01221000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0355 01222000
*    (R14) RESTRICTED;                                             0355 01223000
@RC00323 DS    0H                                                  0355 01224000
EXITIO   DS    0H                                                  0356 01225000
*   R14=RMWALVL2;                   /* GET THE RETURN ADDRESS        */ 01226000
         L     R14,RMWALVL2(,RMWAPTR)                              0356 01227000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0357 01228000
*    (RELPCB,                                                      0357 01229000
*     PCBPTR,                                                      0357 01230000
*     PRIPCB,                                                      0357 01231000
*     R14) UNRESTRICTED;                                           0357 01232000
*   END TERMIO;                                                    0358 01233000
@EL00003 DS    0H                                                  0358 01234000
@EF00003 DS    0H                                                  0358 01235000
@ER00003 BR    @14                                                 0358 01236000
*                                                                  0359 01237000
*/********************************************************************/ 01238000
*/*                                                                  */ 01239000
*/* THE RESET INTERNAL SUBROUTINE IS CALLED TO RESET SUSPENDED RBS   */ 01240000
*/* FOUND DURING RB PURGE OR SRBS FOUND DURING ASCB PURGE. IF THE PCB*/ 01241000
*/* INDICATES THAT RESET SHOULD BE DONE, THE RESET MODULE IS CALLED. */ 01242000
*/* ON RETURN, CONTROL RETURNS TO THE CALLER IN THE QUEUE SEARCH     */ 01243000
*/* MAINLINE.                                                        */ 01244000
*/*                                                                  */ 01245000
*/********************************************************************/ 01246000
*                                                                  0359 01247000
*RSETSUBR:                                                         0359 01248000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               0359 01249000
RSETSUBR DS    0H                                                  0360 01250000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0360 01251000
*    (RELPCB,                                                      0360 01252000
*     PCBPTR,                                                      0360 01253000
*     PRIPCB,                                                      0360 01254000
*     R14) RESTRICTED;                                             0360 01255000
*   RMWALVL2=R14;                   /* SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS       */ 01256000
         ST    R14,RMWALVL2(,RMWAPTR)                              0361 01257000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0362 01258000
*    (R14) UNRESTRICTED;                                           0362 01259000
*   IF PCBRESET='1'B THEN           /* TEST IF RESET MUST BE DONE    */ 01260000
         TM    PCBRESET(PCBPTR),B'00010000'                        0363 01261000
         BNO   @RF00363                                            0363 01262000
*     DO;                           /* RESET IS TO BE DONE           */ 01263000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0365 01264000
*        (R4,                                                      0365 01265000
*         R6,                                                      0365 01266000
*         R13) RESTRICTED;                                         0365 01267000
*       IF PCBSRBMD='1'B THEN       /* TEST IF RESET IS FOR A SRB    */ 01268000
         TM    PCBSRBMD(PCBPTR),B'00100000'                        0366 01269000
         BNO   @RF00366                                            0366 01270000
*         DO;                       /* RESET IS FOR A SRB            */ 01271000
*           R4=PCBSRB;              /* GET THE SRB ADDRESS           */ 01272000
         L     R4,PCBSRB(,PCBPTR)                                  0368 01273000
*           R5=0;                   /* INDICATES NO RB               */ 01274000
         SLR   R5,R5                                               0369 01275000
*         END;                                                     0370 01276000
*       ELSE                        /* NOT SRB PCB. MUST BE RB PCB   */ 01277000
*         DO;                       /* INIT FOE RB                   */ 01278000
         B     @RC00366                                            0371 01279000
@RF00366 DS    0H                                                  0372 01280000
*           R4=PCBRTPA;             /* GET THE TCB ADDRESS           */ 01281000
         L     R4,PCBRTPA-1(,PCBPTR)                               0372 01282000
         LA    R4,0(,R4)                                           0372 01283000
*           R5=PCBSRB;              /* GET THE RB ADDRESS            */ 01284000
         L     R5,PCBSRB(,PCBPTR)                                  0373 01285000
*         END;                                                     0374 01286000
*       R6=0;                       /* NON I/O ERROR                 */ 01287000
@RC00366 SLR   R6,R6                                               0375 01288000
*       R13=ADDR(PVTSAVE);          /* GET THE SAVE AREA ADDRESS     */ 01289000
         LA    R13,PVTSAVE(,PVTPTR)                                0376 01290000
*/********************************************************************/ 01291000
*/*                                                                  */ 01292000
*/*               RESET A RB/SRB                                     */ 01293000
*/*             INPUT:                                               */ 01294000
*/*        R0 - R3: UNUSED                                           */ 01295000
*/*        R4: ADDRESS OF THE SRB IF SRB RESET                       */ 01296000
*/*            TCB ADDRESS IF RB RESET                               */ 01297000
*/*        R5: ZERO IF SRB RESET                                     */ 01298000
*/*            RB ADDRESS IF RB RESET                                */ 01299000
*/*        R6: ZERO                                                  */ 01300000
*/*        R7 - R12: UNUSED                                          */ 01301000
*/*        R13: SAVE AREA ADDRESS                                    */ 01302000
*/*        R14: RETURN ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR                        */ 01303000
*/*        R15: ENTRY POINT ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR                   */ 01304000
*/*             OUTPUT:                                              */ 01305000
*/*        R0 - R15: RESTORED                                        */ 01306000
*/*                                                                  */ 01307000
*/********************************************************************/ 01308000
*                                                                  0377 01309000
*       CALL IEAVRSET;              /* CALL RESET FOR SUSPENDED    0377 01310000
*                                      RB/SRB                        */ 01311000
         L     @15,PVTPRSET(,PVTPTR)                               0377 01312000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0377 01313000
*       RMWAPTR=RMPLRMWA;           /* RESTORE THE RMWA ADDRESS      */ 01314000
         L     RMWAPTR,RMPLRMWA(,RMPLPTR)                          0378 01315000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0379 01316000
*        (R4,                                                      0379 01317000
*         R6,                                                      0379 01318000
*         R13) UNRESTRICTED;                                       0379 01319000
*       PCBRESET='0'B;              /* TURN OFF THE RESET FLAG       */ 01320000
         NI    PCBRESET(PCBPTR),B'11101111'                        0380 01321000
*     END;                                                         0381 01322000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0382 01323000
*    (R14) RESTRICTED;                                             0382 01324000
@RF00363 DS    0H                                                  0383 01325000
*   R14=RMWALVL2;                   /* GET THE RETURN ADDRESS        */ 01326000
         L     R14,RMWALVL2(,RMWAPTR)                              0383 01327000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0384 01328000
*    (RELPCB,                                                      0384 01329000
*     PCBPTR,                                                      0384 01330000
*     PRIPCB,                                                      0384 01331000
*     R14) UNRESTRICTED;                                           0384 01332000
*   END RSETSUBR;                                                  0385 01333000
@EL00004 DS    0H                                                  0385 01334000
@EF00004 DS    0H                                                  0385 01335000
@ER00004 BR    @14                                                 0385 01336000
*                                                                  0386 01337000
*/********************************************************************/ 01338000
*/*                                                                  */ 01339000
*/* THE ROOT PURGE INTERNAL SUBROUTINE IS CALLED TO PURGE ROOT PCBS  */ 01340000
*/* ASSOCIATED WITH PCBS BEING PURGED. IF THE ROOT IS FOR A SWAP-IN, */ 01341000
*/* THE SWAP FLAGS IN THE PCB ARE TURNED OFF; OTHERWISE, THE         */ 01342000
*/* INTERCPET FLAG IN THE ROOT PCB IS TURNED ON. IF THE ROOT         */ 01343000
*/* IS FOR A FIX, THE FOLLOWING IS DONE: IF THE PURGE TYPE           */ 01344000
*/* IS TCB, THE FOE PURGE SUBROUTINE IS CALLED TO GET RID OF         */ 01345000
*/* THE FOE. FOR ALL PURGE TYPES WHICH ARE NOT DEFERRED (A           */ 01346000
*/* FRAME EXISTS,) THE PFTE FIX COUNT IS DECREMENTED BY THE FIX      */ 01347000
*/* COUNT IN THE PCB. IF THE PFTE FIX COUNT GOES TO ZERO, THE        */ 01348000
*/* DEFERRED RELEASE ROUTINE IS CALLED IF NECESSARY. FOR ALL FIX     */ 01349000
*/* PCBS, THE FIX COUNT IN THE PCB IS ZEROED. FOR ALL ROOT PCBS,     */ 01350000
*/* THE ROOT COMPLETION COUNT IS DECREMENTED BY ONE.                 */ 01351000
*/* IF THE ROOT COMPLETION COUNT IS NOW ZERO, THEN ALL PCBS FOR THE  */ 01352000
*/* ROOT HAVE BEEN PROCESSED OR PURGED. IF THE PURGE TYPE IS ASCB AND*/ 01353000
*/* THE ECB IS IN THE PRIVATE AREA, THE ROOT PCB MUST BE FREED (IS   */ 01354000
*/* BECAUSE NO ROUTINE IN THE ADDRESS SPACE WILL EVER RUN AGAIN.) THE*/ 01355000
*/* ROOT PCB IS SENT TO THE FREE QUEUE BY THE PCB MANAGER. ON RETURN,*/ 01356000
*/* CONTROL RETURNS TO THE CALLER. IF THE ABOVE CRITERIA ARE NOT MET,*/ 01357000
*/* THEN THE ROOT EXIT ROUTINE IS CALLED TO PROCESS THE ROOT PCB.    */ 01358000
*/* ON RETURN FROM THE ROOT EXIT ROUTINE, CONTROL RETURNS TO THE     */ 01359000
*/* CALLER.                                                          */ 01360000
*/* IF THE ROOT COMPLETION COUNT IS NOT ZERO, CONTROL RETURNS TO THE */ 01361000
*/* CALLER.                                                          */ 01362000
*/*                                                                  */ 01363000
*/********************************************************************/ 01364000
*                                                                  0386 01365000
*ROOTPURG:                                                         0386 01366000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               0386 01367000
ROOTPURG DS    0H                                                  0387 01368000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0387 01369000
*    (PCBRPTR,                                                     0387 01370000
*     RELPCB,                                                      0387 01371000
*     PCBPTR,                                                      0387 01372000
*     PRIPCB,                                                      0387 01373000
*     R14) RESTRICTED;                                             0387 01374000
*   RMWALVL3=R14;                   /* SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS       */ 01375000
         ST    R14,RMWALVL3(,RMWAPTR)                              0388 01376000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0389 01377000
*    (R14) UNRESTRICTED;                                           0389 01378000
*   PCBRPTR=PCBRTPA;                /* GET THE ROOT PCB ADDRESS      */ 01379000
         L     PCBRPTR,PCBRTPA-1(,PCBPTR)                          0390 01380000
         LA    PCBRPTR,0(,PCBRPTR)                                 0390 01381000
*   PCBROOT='0'B;                   /* TURN OFF THE PCB ROOT FLAG    */ 01382000
         NI    PCBROOT(PCBPTR),B'11111011'                         0391 01383000
*   PCBRTPA=PCBRTCBA;               /* MOVE THE TCB ADDRESS FROM THE    01384000
*                                      ROOT PCB TO THE PCB           */ 01385000
         MVC   PCBRTPA(3,PCBPTR),PCBRTCBA(PCBRPTR)                 0392 01386000
*   IF SPCTSWIN='1'B&SPCTSWRT=PCBRPTR THEN/* TEST IF THE ROOT IS FOR    01387000
*                                      A SWAP IN.                    */ 01388000
         L     @15,RSMSPCT(,RSMHDPTR)                              0393 01389000
         TM    SPCTSWIN(@15),B'10000000'                           0393 01390000
         BNO   @RF00393                                            0393 01391000
         C     PCBRPTR,SPCTSWRT(,@15)                              0393 01392000
         BNE   @RF00393                                            0393 01393000
*     DO;                           /* IS A SWAP IN PCB, SO TURN OFF    01394000
*                                      THE PCB SWAP FLAGS.           */ 01395000
*       PCBSWPIN='0'B;              /* TURN OFF THE SWAP IN FLAG.    */ 01396000
*       PCBSWPS1='0'B;              /* TURN OFF THE STAGE ONE FLAG.  */ 01397000
*       PCBSWPLS='0'B;              /* TURN OFF THE LSQA FLAG.       */ 01398000
*       PCBDFRLS='0'B;              /* TURN OFF THE DEFERRED RELEASE    01399000
*                                      FLAG.                         */ 01400000
         NI    PCBSWPIN(PCBPTR),B'10000111'                        0398 01401000
*     END;                                                         0399 01402000
*   ELSE                            /* ROOT IS NOT A SWAP IN ROOT.   */ 01403000
*     PCBRINT='1'B;                 /* TURN ON THE ROOT INTERCEPT  0400 01404000
*                                      FLAG                          */ 01405000
         B     @RC00393                                            0400 01406000
@RF00393 OI    PCBRINT(PCBRPTR),B'10000000'                        0400 01407000
*   IF PCBFXC¬=0 THEN               /* TEST FOR ANY FIXES TO BE    0401 01408000
*                                      PURGED                        */ 01409000
@RC00393 CLI   PCBFXC(PCBPTR),0                                    0401 01410000
         BE    @RF00401                                            0401 01411000
*     DO;                           /* ARE FIXES, SO PROCESS THEM.   */ 01412000
*       IF RMPLTERM='0'B THEN       /* TEST FOR TCB PURGE            */ 01413000
         TM    RMPLTERM(RMPLPTR),B'01000000'                       0403 01414000
         BNZ   @RF00403                                            0403 01415000
*         CALL FOEPURG;             /* IS TCB PURGE, SO PURGE FOES 0404 01416000
*                                      FOR THIS TCB. ON ASCB PURGE,     01417000
*                                      FOES ARE FREED AUTOMATICALLY.    01418000
*                                      VTERM IS ALSO IN THE WRONG  0404 01419000
*                                      ADDRESS SPACE TO PURGE FOES ON   01420000
*                                      ASCB PURGE                    */ 01421000
         BAL   @14,FOEPURG                                         0404 01422000
*       IF RMWAGFAD='0'B THEN       /* TEST FOR NOT PROCESSING THE 0405 01423000
*                                      GFA DEFER QUEUE. THE PCBS ON     01424000
*                                      THE GFA QUEUE HAVE NO PFTES 0405 01425000
*                                      ASSIGNED AND DO NOT NEED PFTE    01426000
*                                      PROCESSING                    */ 01427000
@RF00403 TM    RMWAGFAD(RMWAPTR),B'10000000'                       0405 01428000
         BNZ   @RF00405                                            0405 01429000
*         DO;                       /* PROCESS THE PFTE.             */ 01430000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0407 01431000
*            (PFTEPTR) RESTRICTED;                                 0407 01432000
*           PFTEPTR=PCBRBN+PVTPFTP; /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE PFTE 0408 01433000
*                                      ALLOCATED TO THIS PCB         */ 01434000
         LH    PFTEPTR,PCBRBN(,PCBPTR)                             0408 01435000
         N     PFTEPTR,@CF02318                                    0408 01436000
         AL    PFTEPTR,PVTPFTP(,PVTPTR)                            0408 01437000
*           PFTFXCT=PFTFXCT-PCBFXC; /* DECREMENT NUMBER OF FIXES ON     01438000
*                                      THE FRAME BY THE NUMBER OF  0409 01439000
*                                      JUST-PURGED FIXES             */ 01440000
         LH    @07,PFTFXCT(,PFTEPTR)                               0409 01441000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0409 01442000
         IC    @15,PCBFXC(,PCBPTR)                                 0409 01443000
         SLR   @07,@15                                             0409 01444000
         STH   @07,PFTFXCT(,PFTEPTR)                               0409 01445000
*           IF PFTFXCT=0 THEN       /* TEST IF ALL FIXES ON THIS   0410 01446000
*                                      FRAME ARE GONE                */ 01447000
         LTR   @07,@07                                             0410 01448000
         BNZ   @RF00410                                            0410 01449000
*             DO;                   /*                       @YA01572*/ 01450000
*               IF PFTQNDX<PFTLFQN THEN/* TEST TO SEE IF     @YA01572*/ 01451000
         CLI   PFTQNDX(PFTEPTR),X'80'                              0412 01452000
         BNL   @RF00412                                            0412 01453000
*                 DO;               /* PFTE IS ON LOCAL      @YA01572*/ 01454000
*                   PVTCNTFX=PVTCNTFX-1;/* OR GLOBAL QUEUE   @YA01572*/ 01455000
         LH    @07,PVTCNTFX(,PVTPTR)                               0414 01456000
         BCTR  @07,0                                               0414 01457000
         STH   @07,PVTCNTFX(,PVTPTR)                               0414 01458000
*                   PVTCOMFX=PVTCOMFX-1;/* MUST BE A GLOBAL  @YA01572*/ 01459000
         LH    @07,PVTCOMFX(,PVTPTR)                               0415 01460000
         BCTR  @07,0                                               0415 01461000
         STH   @07,PVTCOMFX(,PVTPTR)                               0415 01462000
*                 END;              /* QUEUE                 @YA01572*/ 01463000
*               ELSE                /* MUST BE A LOCAL       @YA01572*/ 01464000
*                 DO;               /* QUEUE                 @YA01572*/ 01465000
         B     @RC00412                                            0417 01466000
@RF00412 DS    0H                                                  0418 01467000
*                   RSMCNTFX=RSMCNTFX-1;/*                   @YA01572*/ 01468000
         LH    @07,RSMCNTFX(,RSMHDPTR)                             0418 01469000
         BCTR  @07,0                                               0418 01470000
         STH   @07,RSMCNTFX(,RSMHDPTR)                             0418 01471000
*                   PVTCNTFX=PVTCNTFX-1;/*                   @YA01572*/ 01472000
         LH    @07,PVTCNTFX(,PVTPTR)                               0419 01473000
         BCTR  @07,0                                               0419 01474000
         STH   @07,PVTCNTFX(,PVTPTR)                               0419 01475000
*                 END;              /*                       @YA01572   01476000
*                                      ALL FIXES GONE DO DEFERRED  0420 01477000
*                                      RELEASE PROC IF NECESSARY     */ 01478000
*               PFTLNGFX='0'B;      /* TURN OFF THE LONG FIX FLAG    */ 01479000
@RC00412 NI    PFTLNGFX(PFTEPTR),B'11101111'                       0421 01480000
*               IF PFTDFRLS='1'B THEN/* TEST IF DEFERRED RELEASE   0422 01481000
*                                      PROCESSING MUST BE DONE       */ 01482000
         TM    PFTDFRLS(PFTEPTR),B'10000000'                       0422 01483000
         BNO   @RF00422                                            0422 01484000
*                 DO;               /* DEF. RELS. MUST BE DONE FOR 0423 01485000
*                                      THIS FRAME. NEED NOT BE DONE     01486000
*                                      FOR ASCB PURGE WITH PRIVATE 0423 01487000
*                                      AREA VBN                      */ 01488000
*                                                                  0423 01489000
*                   /*************************************************/ 01490000
*                   /*                                               */ 01491000
*                   /* TEST FOR ASCB PURGE AND PRIVATE AREA VBN. IF  */ 01492000
*                   /* NOT, THEN MUST DO DEFERRED RELEASE.           */ 01493000
*                   /*                                               */ 01494000
*                   /*************************************************/ 01495000
*                                                                  0424 01496000
*                   IF¬(RMPLTERM='1'B&PCBVBN<PVTLCSA) THEN         0424 01497000
*                                                                  0424 01498000
         TM    RMPLTERM(RMPLPTR),B'01000000'                       0424 01499000
         BNO   @RT00424                                            0424 01500000
         CLC   PCBVBN(2,PCBPTR),PVTLCSA(PVTPTR)                    0424 01501000
         BL    @RF00424                                            0424 01502000
@RT00424 DS    0H                                                  0425 01503000
*                     /***********************************************/ 01504000
*                     /*                                             */ 01505000
*                     /* TESTS TRUE                                  */ 01506000
*                     /*                                             */ 01507000
*                     /***********************************************/ 01508000
*                                                                  0425 01509000
*                     DO;           /* IS NOT PRIV. VBN. MUST DO   0425 01510000
*                                      DEFERRED RELEASE PROCESSING   */ 01511000
*                       RESPECIFY                                  0426 01512000
*                        (R0,                                      0426 01513000
*                         R1,                                      0426 01514000
*                         R15) RESTRICTED;                         0426 01515000
*                       R1=PCBVBN*256;/* GET THE VSA TO BE RELEASED  */ 01516000
         LH    R1,PCBVBN(,PCBPTR)                                  0427 01517000
         N     R1,@CF02318                                         0427 01518000
         SLA   R1,8                                                0427 01519000
*/********************************************************************/ 01520000
*/*                                                                  */ 01521000
*/*                   DEFERRED RELEASE                               */ 01522000
*/*                 INPUT:                                           */ 01523000
*/*            R0: UNUSED                                            */ 01524000
*/*            R1: VIRTUAL ADDRESS TO BE RELEASED                    */ 01525000
*/*            R2: ADDRESS OF RSMHD                                  */ 01526000
*/*            R3: ADDRESS OF PVT                                    */ 01527000
*/*            R4 - R13: UNUSED                                      */ 01528000
*/*            R14: RETURN ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR                    */ 01529000
*/*            R15: ENTRY POINT ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR               */ 01530000
*/*                 OUTPUT:                                          */ 01531000
*/*            R0: ZERO                                              */ 01532000
*/*            R1 - R14: RESTORED                                    */ 01533000
*/*            R15: RETURN CODE                                      */ 01534000
*/*                   0 - SUCCESSFUL                                 */ 01535000
*/*                   NON-0 - UNSUCCESSFUL                           */ 01536000
*/*                                                                  */ 01537000
*/********************************************************************/ 01538000
*                                                                  0428 01539000
*                       CALL IEAVRELF;/* CALL DEFERRED RELEASE       */ 01540000
         L     @15,PVTPRELF(,PVTPTR)                               0428 01541000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0428 01542000
*                       RCACSECT=RCACPTRM;/* RESET MODULE ID         */ 01543000
         L     @14,PVTPRCA(,PVTPTR)                                0429 01544000
         MVI   RCACSECT(@14),X'11'                                 0429 01545000
*                       IF R15¬=0 THEN/* TEST FOR A BAD RETURN CODE  */ 01546000
         LTR   R15,R15                                             0430 01547000
         BZ    @RF00430                                            0430 01548000
*                         DO;       /* RECORD THE ERROR              */ 01549000
*                           RCARCRD='0F'X;/* SET ERROR REASON CODE   */ 01550000
         MVI   RCARCRD(@14),X'0F'                                  0432 01551000
*                           GENERATE CODE SETS(R1);                0433 01552000
         ABEND X'C0D',,,SYSTEM      RECORD THE ERROR                    01553000
*                         END;                                     0434 01554000
*                       RESPECIFY                                  0435 01555000
*                        (R0,                                      0435 01556000
*                         R1,                                      0435 01557000
*                         R15,                                     0435 01558000
*                         PFTEPTR) UNRESTRICTED;                   0435 01559000
@RF00430 DS    0H                                                  0436 01560000
*                     END;                                         0436 01561000
*                 END;                                             0437 01562000
@RF00424 DS    0H                                                  0438 01563000
*             END;                                                 0438 01564000
@RF00422 DS    0H                                                  0439 01565000
*         END;                                                     0439 01566000
@RF00410 DS    0H                                                  0440 01567000
*       PCBFXC=0;                   /* ZERO THE FIX COUNT IN CASE THE   01568000
*                                      PCB REMAINS ON A QUEUE        */ 01569000
@RF00405 MVI   PCBFXC(PCBPTR),X'00'                                0440 01570000
*     END;                                                         0441 01571000
*   PCBRCNT=PCBRCNT-1;              /* DECREMENT ROOT COMPLETION   0442 01572000
*                                      COUNT                         */ 01573000
@RF00401 LH    @15,PCBRCNT(,PCBRPTR)                               0442 01574000
         BCTR  @15,0                                               0442 01575000
         STH   @15,PCBRCNT(,PCBRPTR)                               0442 01576000
*   IF PCBRCNT=0 THEN               /* TEST FOR ZERO COMPLETION COUNT   01577000
*                                      MEANS ALL PCBS FOR THE ROOT 0443 01578000
*                                      HAVE BEEN PROCESSED           */ 01579000
         LTR   @15,@15                                             0443 01580000
         BNZ   @RF00443                                            0443 01581000
*     DO;                           /* COMPLETION COUNT IS ZERO. GET    01582000
*                                      RID OF THE ROOT PCB           */ 01583000
*       IF RMPLTERM='1'B&SPCTSWIN='0'B THEN/* TEST FOR ASCB PURGE AND   01584000
*                                      SWAP IN NOT IN PROGRESS. IF 0445 01585000
*                                      ASCB IS BEING PURGED AND THE     01586000
*                                      ECB IS IN THE PRIVATE AREA, 0445 01587000
*                                      THE ROOT PCB MUST BE FREED, 0445 01588000
*                                      OTHERWISE IT WOULD NEVER BE 0445 01589000
*                                      PURGED. FOR COMMON AREA ECB,     01590000
*                                      SWAP IN, OR TCB PURGE, THE  0445 01591000
*                                      ROOT EXIT ROUTINE TAKES CARE     01592000
*                                      OF THE ROOT PCB.              */ 01593000
         TM    RMPLTERM(RMPLPTR),B'01000000'                       0445 01594000
         BNO   @RF00445                                            0445 01595000
         L     @01,RSMSPCT(,RSMHDPTR)                              0445 01596000
         TM    SPCTSWIN(@01),B'10000000'                           0445 01597000
         BNZ   @RF00445                                            0445 01598000
*         DO;                       /* IS ASCB PURGE. CHECK FOR    0446 01599000
*                                      COMMON AREA ECB               */ 01600000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0447 01601000
*            (VSAPTR) RESTRICTED;                                  0447 01602000
*           VSAPTR=PCBRECB;         /* GET THE VSA OF THE ECB        */ 01603000
         L     VSAPTR,PCBRECB(,PCBRPTR)                            0448 01604000
*           VSAPTR=VSAPTR/4096;     /* SHIFT RIGHT 12                */ 01605000
         SRL   VSAPTR,12                                           0449 01606000
*           VSAPTR=VSAPTR*16;       /* SHIFT LEFT 4 TO MAKE THE VBN  */ 01607000
         SLL   VSAPTR,4                                            0450 01608000
*           IF VSAPTR<PVTLCSA THEN  /* TEST FOR PRIVATE AREA VBN ( 0451 01609000
*                                      ECB IN P.A.)                  */ 01610000
         LH    @06,PVTLCSA(,PVTPTR)                                0451 01611000
         N     @06,@CF02318                                        0451 01612000
         CR    VSAPTR,@06                                          0451 01613000
         BNL   @RF00451                                            0451 01614000
*             DO;                   /* IS PRIVATE AREA ECB AND ASCB     01615000
*                                      PURGE, SO FREE THE ROOT PCB   */ 01616000
*               RESPECIFY                                          0453 01617000
*                (VSAPTR) UNRESTRICTED;                            0453 01618000
*               PCBRPTR->PCBFQP='FF000000'X;/* SET ROOT PCB TO     0454 01619000
*                                      UNQUEUED STATE WITH ZERO    0454 01620000
*                                      FOREWARD POINTER              */ 01621000
         MVC   PCBFQP(4,PCBRPTR),@CF02280                          0454 01622000
*               RESPECIFY                                          0455 01623000
*                (R0,                                              0455 01624000
*                 R1) RESTRICTED;                                  0455 01625000
*               R0=PCBFREQN;        /* SET TQN TO THE FREE QUEUE TQN */ 01626000
         LA    R0,16                                               0456 01627000
*               R1=PCBRPTR;         /* SET POINTER TO THE ROOT PCB   */ 01628000
         LR    R1,PCBRPTR                                          0457 01629000
*/********************************************************************/ 01630000
*/*                                                                  */ 01631000
*/*                   PCB MANAGER                                    */ 01632000
*/*                 INPUT:                                           */ 01633000
*/*            R0: TQN (FOR THE FREE QUEUE)                          */ 01634000
*/*            R1: ADDRESS OF THE PCB                                */ 01635000
*/*            R2: ADDRESS OF RSMHD                                  */ 01636000
*/*            R3: ADDRESS OF PVT                                    */ 01637000
*/*            R4 - R13: UNUSED                                      */ 01638000
*/*            R14: RETURN ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR                    */ 01639000
*/*            R15: ENTRY POINT ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR               */ 01640000
*/*                 OUTPUT:                                          */ 01641000
*/*            R0 - R15: RESTORED                                    */ 01642000
*/*                                                                  */ 01643000
*/********************************************************************/ 01644000
*                                                                  0458 01645000
*               CALL IEAVPCB;       /* CALL PCB MANAGER TO FREE THE     01646000
*                                      ROOT PCB                      */ 01647000
         L     @15,PVTPCB(,PVTPTR)                                 0458 01648000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0458 01649000
*               GOTO EXITROOT;      /* GO TO THE EXIT ROUTINE        */ 01650000
         B     EXITROOT                                            0459 01651000
*             END;                                                 0460 01652000
*         END;                                                     0461 01653000
*                                                                  0461 01654000
@RF00451 DS    0H                                                  0462 01655000
*       /*************************************************************/ 01656000
*       /*                                                           */ 01657000
*       /* MUST BE TCB PURGE, ASCB PURGE WITH COMMON AREA ECB, OR    */ 01658000
*       /* ASCB PURGE WITH SWAP IN ONGOING TO BE HERE                */ 01659000
*       /*                                                           */ 01660000
*       /*************************************************************/ 01661000
*                                                                  0462 01662000
*       R1=PCBRPTR;                 /* GET THE ROOT PCB ADDRESS FOR     01663000
*                                      THE ROOT EXIT ROUTINE         */ 01664000
@RF00445 LR    R1,PCBRPTR                                          0462 01665000
*/********************************************************************/ 01666000
*/*                                                                  */ 01667000
*/*                     ROOT EXIT ROUTINE                            */ 01668000
*/*                   INPUT:                                         */ 01669000
*/*              R0: UNUSED                                          */ 01670000
*/*              R1: ADDRESS OF THE ROOT PCB                         */ 01671000
*/*              R2: ADDRESS OF RSMHD                                */ 01672000
*/*              R3: ADDRESS OF PVT                                  */ 01673000
*/*              R4 - R13: UNUSED                                    */ 01674000
*/*              R14: RETURN ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR                  */ 01675000
*/*              R15: ENTRY POINT ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR             */ 01676000
*/*                   OUTPUT:                                        */ 01677000
*/*              R0 - R15: RESTORED                                  */ 01678000
*/*                                                                  */ 01679000
*/********************************************************************/ 01680000
*                                                                  0463 01681000
*       CALL ROOTEXIT;              /* CALL THE ROOT EXIT ROUTINE    */ 01682000
         L     @15,PCBRGOTO(,PCBRPTR)                              0463 01683000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0463 01684000
*       RCACSECT=RCACPTRM;          /* RESET THE RCA CSECT ID        */ 01685000
         L     @15,PVTPRCA(,PVTPTR)                                0464 01686000
         MVI   RCACSECT(@15),X'11'                                 0464 01687000
*     END;                                                         0465 01688000
*                                                                  0465 01689000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01690000
*   /*                                                               */ 01691000
*   /* EXIT POINT FOR ROOTPURG SUBROUTINE                            */ 01692000
*   /*                                                               */ 01693000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01694000
*                                                                  0466 01695000
*EXITROOT:                                                         0466 01696000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0466 01697000
*    (R14) RESTRICTED;                                             0466 01698000
@RF00443 DS    0H                                                  0466 01699000
EXITROOT DS    0H                                                  0467 01700000
*   R14=RMWALVL3;                   /* GET THE RETURN ADDRESS        */ 01701000
         L     R14,RMWALVL3(,RMWAPTR)                              0467 01702000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0468 01703000
*    (R0,                                                          0468 01704000
*     R1,                                                          0468 01705000
*     PCBRPTR,                                                     0468 01706000
*     RELPCB,                                                      0468 01707000
*     PCBPTR,                                                      0468 01708000
*     PRIPCB,                                                      0468 01709000
*     R14) UNRESTRICTED;                                           0468 01710000
*   END ROOTPURG;                                                  0469 01711000
@EL00005 DS    0H                                                  0469 01712000
@EF00005 DS    0H                                                  0469 01713000
@ER00005 BR    @14                                                 0469 01714000
*                                                                  0470 01715000
*/********************************************************************/ 01716000
*/*                                                                  */ 01717000
*/* THE FOE PURGE INTERNAL SUBROUTINE IS CALLED TO PURGE THE FOE     */ 01718000
*/* ASSOCIATED WITH A FIX PCB WHICH IS BEING PURGED. THIS            */ 01719000
*/* SUBROUTINE IS CALLED ONLY DURING TCB PURGE FOR PCBS WITH FIX     */ 01720000
*/* ROOTS. THE FOE CHAIN OUT OF THE TCB ADDRESSED BY THE PCB IS      */ 01721000
*/* SCANNED FOR THE FOE FOR THE PURGED FIX. IF THE FOE IS NOT        */ 01722000
*/* FOUND, AN ERROR IS RECORDED AND CONTROL IS PASSED TO THE EXIT    */ 01723000
*/* POINT. IF THE FOE IS FOUND, THE PCB FIX COUNT IS SUBTRACTED      */ 01724000
*/* FROM THE FOE FIX COUNT. IF THE FOE FIX COUNT IS NOW ZERO, THE    */ 01725000
*/* FOE IS DEQUEUED FROM TCBFOE AND INSERTED ON THE AVAILABLE QUEUE  */ 01726000
*/* (RSMFOEQ). CONTROL RETURNS TO THE ROOT PURGE ROUTINE.            */ 01727000
*/*                                                                  */ 01728000
*/********************************************************************/ 01729000
*                                                                  0470 01730000
*FOEPURG:                                                          0470 01731000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               0470 01732000
FOEPURG  DS    0H                                                  0471 01733000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0471 01734000
*    (PCBRPTR,                                                     0471 01735000
*     FOEPTR,                                                      0471 01736000
*     RELPCB,                                                      0471 01737000
*     PCBPTR,                                                      0471 01738000
*     PRIPCB,                                                      0471 01739000
*     R7,                                                          0471 01740000
*     R14) RESTRICTED;                                             0471 01741000
*   RMWALVL4=R14;                   /* SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS       */ 01742000
         ST    R14,RMWALVL4(,RMWAPTR)                              0472 01743000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0473 01744000
*    (R14) UNRESTRICTED;                                           0473 01745000
*   FOEPTR=TCBFOEA;                 /* GET THE FIRST FOE FOR THIS TCB*/ 01746000
         L     @06,RMPLTCBA(,RMPLPTR)                              0474 01747000
         L     FOEPTR,TCBFOEA-1(,@06)                              0474 01748000
         LA    FOEPTR,0(,FOEPTR)                                   0474 01749000
*   R7=ADDR(TCBFOE);                /* SAVE THE BACK FOE POINTER     */ 01750000
         LA    R7,TCBFOE(,@06)                                     0475 01751000
*TESTFOE:                                                          0476 01752000
*   IF FOEPTR=0 THEN                /* TEST FOR FOE NOT FOUND        */ 01753000
TESTFOE  LTR   FOEPTR,FOEPTR                                       0476 01754000
         BNZ   @RF00476                                            0476 01755000
*     DO;                           /* NO FOE FOUND FOR THE INPUT  0477 01756000
*                                      VBN. IS AN ERROR. RECORD    0477 01757000
*                                      ERROR, THEN EXIT              */ 01758000
*       RCARCRD='10'X;              /* SET ERROR REASON CODE         */ 01759000
         L     @06,PVTPRCA(,PVTPTR)                                0478 01760000
         MVI   RCARCRD(@06),X'10'                                  0478 01761000
*       GENERATE CODE SETS(R1);                                    0479 01762000
         ABEND X'C0D',,,SYSTEM      RECORD THE ERROR                    01763000
*       GOTO EXITFOE;               /* SKIP FOE PROCESSING           */ 01764000
         B     EXITFOE                                             0480 01765000
*     END;                                                         0481 01766000
*   IF FOEVINDX¬=PCBVBN THEN        /* TEST FOR CORRECT FOE BY VBN   */ 01767000
@RF00476 CLC   FOEVINDX(2,FOEPTR),PCBVBN(PCBPTR)                   0482 01768000
         BE    @RF00482                                            0482 01769000
*     DO;                           /* IS NOT THE CORRECT FOE. GET 0483 01770000
*                                      NEXT FOE AND TEST FOR A MATCH */ 01771000
*       R7=FOEPTR;                  /* SAVE THE POINTER TO THIS FOE  */ 01772000
         LR    R7,FOEPTR                                           0484 01773000
*       FOEPTR=FOEFLINK;            /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE NEXT 0485 01774000
*                                      FOE                           */ 01775000
         L     @06,FOEFLINK-1(,FOEPTR)                             0485 01776000
         LA    @06,0(,@06)                                         0485 01777000
         LR    FOEPTR,@06                                          0485 01778000
*       GOTO TESTFOE;               /* GO TEST FOR CORRECT FOE       */ 01779000
         B     TESTFOE                                             0486 01780000
*     END;                                                         0487 01781000
*                                                                  0487 01782000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01783000
*   /*                                                               */ 01784000
*   /* IS CORRECT FOE IF PROCESSING COMES HERE                       */ 01785000
*   /*                                                               */ 01786000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01787000
*                                                                  0488 01788000
*   FOEFXCT=FOEFXCT-PCBFXC;         /* DECREMENT FOE FIX COUNT BY FIX   01789000
*                                      COUNT IN THE PCB. THE FIX HAS    01790000
*                                      BEEN PURGED AND THE FOE MUST     01791000
*                                      BE ADJUSTED                   */ 01792000
@RF00482 LH    @06,FOEFXCT(,FOEPTR)                                0488 01793000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0488 01794000
         IC    @15,PCBFXC(,PCBPTR)                                 0488 01795000
         SLR   @06,@15                                             0488 01796000
         STH   @06,FOEFXCT(,FOEPTR)                                0488 01797000
*   IF FOEFXCT=0 THEN               /* TEST IF ALL FIXES BY THIS TASK   01798000
*                                      HAVE GONE                     */ 01799000
         LTR   @06,@06                                             0489 01800000
         BNZ   @RF00489                                            0489 01801000
*     DO;                           /* ALL FIXES GONE, SO RECHAIN FOE   01802000
*                                      TO AVAILABLE QUEUE    @Z30CNYC*/ 01803000
*       R7->FOEFLINK=FOEFLINK;      /* SET PREVIOUS FOE TO POINT TO     01804000
*                                      THE FOE AFTER THE FOE TO BE 0491 01805000
*                                      DEQUEUED.                     */ 01806000
         MVC   FOEFLINK(3,R7),FOEFLINK(FOEPTR)                     0491 01807000
*       FOEFLINK=RSMFOEQ;           /* AVAIL QUE TO THIS FOE @Z30CNYC*/ 01808000
         MVC   FOEFLINK(3,FOEPTR),RSMFOEQ+1(RSMHDPTR)              0492 01809000
*       RSMFOEQ=FOEPTR;             /* CHAIN TO HEAD OF      @Z30CNYC   01810000
*                                      AVAILABLE QUEUE.      @Z30CNYC*/ 01811000
         ST    FOEPTR,RSMFOEQ(,RSMHDPTR)                           0493 01812000
*     END;                                                         0494 01813000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0495 01814000
*    (R14) RESTRICTED;                                             0495 01815000
@RF00489 DS    0H                                                  0496 01816000
*EXITFOE:                                                          0496 01817000
*   R14=RMWALVL4;                   /* GET THE RETURN ADDRESS        */ 01818000
EXITFOE  L     R14,RMWALVL4(,RMWAPTR)                              0496 01819000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0497 01820000
*    (PCBRPTR,                                                     0497 01821000
*     FOEPTR,                                                      0497 01822000
*     RELPCB,                                                      0497 01823000
*     PCBPTR,                                                      0497 01824000
*     PRIPCB,                                                      0497 01825000
*     R14,                                                         0497 01826000
*     R7) UNRESTRICTED;                                            0497 01827000
*   END FOEPURG;                                                   0498 01828000
@EL00006 DS    0H                                                  0498 01829000
@EF00006 DS    0H                                                  0498 01830000
@ER00006 BR    @14                                                 0498 01831000
*                                                                  0499 01832000
*/********************************************************************/ 01833000
*/*                                                                  */ 01834000
*/* THE PCB FREE INTERNAL SUBROUTINE FREES THE CURRENT PCB AND RESETS*/ 01835000
*/* THE PCB QUEUES TO CONTINUE PROCESSING. IF THE PCB IS A RELATED   */ 01836000
*/* PCB, THE RELATED POINTERS ARE ADJUSTED TO REMOVE THE PCB FROM    */ 01837000
*/* THE RELATED CHAIN. THE PCB IS THEN FREED TO THE SYSTEM AND       */ 01838000
*/* CONTROL RETURNS TO THE QUEUE SEARCH ROUTINE TO PROCESS THE NEXT  */ 01839000
*/* PCB. IF THE PCB IS NOT A RELATED PCB, THEN IT IS TESTED FOR A    */ 01840000
*/* RELATED PCB. IF THE PCB HAS NO RELATED PCBS, IT IS FREED AND     */ 01841000
*/* CONTROL RETURNS TO THE QUEUE SEARCH ROUTINE. IF THERE ARE        */ 01842000
*/* RELATED PCBS, THE WHOLE RELATED CHAIN IS ENQUEUED TO THE QUEUE   */ 01843000
*/* WITH THE FIRST RELATED PCB AS THE NEW PRIMARY PCB. IF THE I/O IS */ 01844000
*/* COMPLETE FOR THE PCB AND THE PCB IS ON THE COMMON I/O ACTIVE     */ 01845000
*/* QUEUE, IEAVIOCP IS SCHEDULED FOR THE PCB. AFTER THE RELATED PCBS */ 01846000
*/* ARE ENQUEUED, THE PRIMARY PCB IS FREED. CONTROL RETURNS TO THE   */ 01847000
*/* QUEUE SEARCH MAINLINE.                                           */ 01848000
*/*                                                                  */ 01849000
*/********************************************************************/ 01850000
*                                                                  0499 01851000
*FREEPCB:                                                          0499 01852000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               0499 01853000
FREEPCB  DS    0H                                                  0500 01854000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0500 01855000
*    (R0,                                                          0500 01856000
*     R1,                                                          0500 01857000
*     BACKPCB,                                                     0500 01858000
*     RELPCB,                                                      0500 01859000
*     PCBPTR,                                                      0500 01860000
*     PRIPCB,                                                      0500 01861000
*     R14) RESTRICTED;                                             0500 01862000
*   RMWALVL2=R14;                   /* SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS       */ 01863000
         ST    R14,RMWALVL2(,RMWAPTR)                              0501 01864000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0502 01865000
*    (R14) UNRESTRICTED;                                           0502 01866000
*   IF PCBCQN=PCBDEQN THEN          /* TEST IF THE PCB TO BE FREED IS   01867000
*                                      A RELATED PCB. (IS RELATED IF    01868000
*                                      CQN IS X'FF')                 */ 01869000
         CLI   PCBCQN(PCBPTR),255                                  0503 01870000
         BNE   @RF00503                                            0503 01871000
*     RELPCB->PCBRLPA=PCBRLPA;      /* IS A RELATED PCB. SAVE      0504 01872000
*                                      POINTERS SO THAT THE REST OF     01873000
*                                      THE RELATED CHAIN CAN BE    0504 01874000
*                                      PROCESSED. SET THE PREVIOUS 0504 01875000
*                                      PCB TO POINT TO THE RELATED 0504 01876000
*                                      PCB AFTER THE INPUT PCB IS  0504 01877000
*                                      FREED                         */ 01878000
         MVC   PCBRLPA(3,RELPCB),PCBRLPA(PCBPTR)                   0504 01879000
*   ELSE                            /* NOT A RELATED PCB. IF THE   0505 01880000
*                                      PRIMARY PCB HAS A RELATED PCB,   01881000
*                                      THE RELATED MUST BE ENQUEUED     01882000
*                                      AS A PRIMARY BEFORE THE FREE     01883000
*                                      OF THE INPUT PCB              */ 01884000
*     IF PCBRLPA¬=0 THEN            /* TEST FOR ANY RELATED PCBS     */ 01885000
         B     @RC00503                                            0505 01886000
@RF00503 L     @15,PCBRLPA-1(,PCBPTR)                              0505 01887000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0505 01888000
         LTR   @15,@15                                             0505 01889000
         BZ    @RF00505                                            0505 01890000
*       DO;                         /* THERE IS A RELATED PCB. IT  0506 01891000
*                                      MUST BE ENQUEUED AS A PRIMARY    01892000
*                                      BEFORE THE INPUT PCB CAN BE 0506 01893000
*                                      FREED                         */ 01894000
*         R1=PCBRLPA;               /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE RELATED*/ 01895000
         LR    R1,@15                                              0507 01896000
*         R1->PCBFQP='FF000000'X;   /* SET UP THE RELATED PCB AS AN     01897000
*                                      UNQUEUED PCB                  */ 01898000
         MVC   PCBFQP(4,R1),@CF02280                               0508 01899000
*         IF PCBGFAD='1'B THEN      /* TEST FOR THE GFAD BIT ON IN 0509 01900000
*                                      THE PRIMARY PCB               */ 01901000
         TM    PCBGFAD(PCBPTR),B'01000000'                         0509 01902000
         BNO   @RF00509                                            0509 01903000
*           R1->PCBGFAD='1'B;       /* GFAD IS ON IN THE PRIMARY, SO    01904000
*                                      TURN ON IN THE RELATED        */ 01905000
         OI    PCBGFAD(R1),B'01000000'                             0510 01906000
*         R0=PCBCQN;                /* SET TQN SO THAT THE RELATED 0511 01907000
*                                      WILL BE ENQUEUED TO THE SAME     01908000
*                                      QUEUE AS THE PRIMARY          */ 01909000
@RF00509 SLR   R0,R0                                               0511 01910000
         IC    R0,PCBCQN(,PCBPTR)                                  0511 01911000
*         PCBVBN=0;                 /* ZERO THE VBN IN THE PRIMARY SO   01912000
*                                      THAT TWO PCBS DO NOT HAVE THE    01913000
*                                      SAME VBN WHILE ON THE SAME  0512 01914000
*                                      QUEUE                         */ 01915000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0512 01916000
         STH   @15,PCBVBN(,PCBPTR)                                 0512 01917000
*/********************************************************************/ 01918000
*/*                                                                  */ 01919000
*/*                       PCB MANAGER                                */ 01920000
*/*                     INPUT:                                       */ 01921000
*/*                R0: TQN                                           */ 01922000
*/*                R1: ADDRESS OF THE PCB                            */ 01923000
*/*                R2: ADDRESS OF RSMHD                              */ 01924000
*/*                R3: ADDRESS OF PVT                                */ 01925000
*/*                R4 - R13: UNUSED                                  */ 01926000
*/*                R14: RETURN ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR                */ 01927000
*/*                R15: ENTRY POINT ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR           */ 01928000
*/*                     OUTPUT:                                      */ 01929000
*/*                R0 - R15: RESTORED                                */ 01930000
*/*                                                                  */ 01931000
*/********************************************************************/ 01932000
*                                                                  0513 01933000
*         CALL IEAVPCB;             /* CALL PCB MANAGER TO ENQUEUE 0513 01934000
*                                      THE RELATED AS A PRIMARY      */ 01935000
*                                                                  0513 01936000
         L     @15,PVTPCB(,PVTPTR)                                 0513 01937000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0513 01938000
*         /***********************************************************/ 01939000
*         /*                                                         */ 01940000
*         /* TEST FOR I/O COMPLETE AND PROCESSING COMMON I/O Q AND   */ 01941000
*         /* THE JUST-QUEUED PCB NOT FOR THE ADDRESS SPACE BEING     */ 01942000
*         /* PURGED                                                  */ 01943000
*         /*                                                         */ 01944000
*         /***********************************************************/ 01945000
*                                                                  0514 01946000
*         IF(PCBIOCMP='1'B&RMWACIOQ='1'B&RMPLTERM='1'B&RMPLASCB¬=R1->   01947000
*             PCBASCB) THEN                                        0514 01948000
*                                                                  0514 01949000
         TM    PCBIOCMP(PCBPTR),B'00000001'                        0514 01950000
         BNO   @RF00514                                            0514 01951000
         TM    RMWACIOQ(RMWAPTR),B'01000000'                       0514 01952000
         BNO   @RF00514                                            0514 01953000
         TM    RMPLTERM(RMPLPTR),B'01000000'                       0514 01954000
         BNO   @RF00514                                            0514 01955000
         CLC   RMPLASCB(4,RMPLPTR),PCBASCB(R1)                     0514 01956000
         BE    @RF00514                                            0514 01957000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01958000
*           /*                                                       */ 01959000
*           /* ABOVE TESTS TRUE                                      */ 01960000
*           /*                                                       */ 01961000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01962000
*                                                                  0515 01963000
*           CALL IEAVOPBR;          /* CALL ROUTINE TO SCHEDULE IOCP    01964000
*                                      FOR THE JUST-ENQUEUED PCB     */ 01965000
         L     @15,PVTPOPBR(,PVTPTR)                               0515 01966000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0515 01967000
*/********************************************************************/ 01968000
*/*                                                                  */ 01969000
*/*                     IOCP SCHEDULE BRANCH ENTRY (IN IEAVPIOP)     */ 01970000
*/*                   INPUT:                                         */ 01971000
*/*              R0: UNUSED                                          */ 01972000
*/*              R1: ADDRESS OF THE PCB TO HAVE IOCP SCHEDULED       */ 01973000
*/*              R2: UNUSED                                          */ 01974000
*/*              R3: ADDRESS OF PVT                                  */ 01975000
*/*              R4 - R13: UNUSED                                    */ 01976000
*/*              R14: RETURN ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR                  */ 01977000
*/*              R15: ENTRY POINT ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR             */ 01978000
*/*                   OUTPUT:                                        */ 01979000
*/*              R0 - R15: RESTORED                                  */ 01980000
*/*                                                                  */ 01981000
*/********************************************************************/ 01982000
*                                                                  0516 01983000
*       END;                                                       0516 01984000
@RF00514 DS    0H                                                  0517 01985000
*   R1=PCBPTR;                      /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE PRIMARY   01986000
*                                      PCB TO BE FREED               */ 01987000
@RF00505 DS    0H                                                  0517 01988000
@RC00503 LR    R1,PCBPTR                                           0517 01989000
*   R0=PCBFREQN;                    /* SET TQN TO THE FREE QUEUE     */ 01990000
         LA    R0,16                                               0518 01991000
*/********************************************************************/ 01992000
*/*                                                                  */ 01993000
*/*                 PCB MANAGER                                      */ 01994000
*/*               INPUT:                                             */ 01995000
*/*          R0: TQN (FOR THE FREE QUEUE)                            */ 01996000
*/*          R1: ADDRESS OF THE PCB                                  */ 01997000
*/*          R2: ADDRESS OF RSMHD                                    */ 01998000
*/*          R3: ADDRESS OF PVT                                      */ 01999000
*/*          R4 - R13: UNUSED                                        */ 02000000
*/*          R14: RETURN ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR                      */ 02001000
*/*          R15: ENTRY POINT ADDRESS LOADED BY BALR                 */ 02002000
*/*               OUTPUT:                                            */ 02003000
*/*          R0 - R15: RESTORED                                      */ 02004000
*/*                                                                  */ 02005000
*/********************************************************************/ 02006000
*                                                                  0519 02007000
*   CALL IEAVPCB;                   /* CALL PCB MANAGER TO FREE THE     02008000
*                                      INPUT PCB                     */ 02009000
         L     @15,PVTPCB(,PVTPTR)                                 0519 02010000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0519 02011000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0520 02012000
*    (R14) RESTRICTED;                                             0520 02013000
*   R14=RMWALVL2;                   /* GET THE RETURN ADDRESS        */ 02014000
         L     R14,RMWALVL2(,RMWAPTR)                              0521 02015000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0522 02016000
*    (R0,                                                          0522 02017000
*     R1,                                                          0522 02018000
*     BACKPCB,                                                     0522 02019000
*     RELPCB,                                                      0522 02020000
*     PCBPTR,                                                      0522 02021000
*     PRIPCB,                                                      0522 02022000
*     R14) UNRESTRICTED;                                           0522 02023000
*   END FREEPCB;                                                   0523 02024000
@EL00007 DS    0H                                                  0523 02025000
@EF00007 DS    0H                                                  0523 02026000
@ER00007 BR    @14                                                 0523 02027000
*                                                                  0524 02028000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02029000
*   /*                                                               */ 02030000
*   /* THE FIX PURGE SUBROUTINE IS CALLED TO PURGE FIXES FOR A TCB   */ 02031000
*   /* BEING TERMINATED. IT IS CALLED AFTER ALL PAGING I/O FOR THE   */ 02032000
*   /* TCB HAS BEEN PURGED. IF FIX PURGES ARE NOT TO BE DONE, THIS   */ 02033000
*   /* SUBROUTINE WILL NOT BE CALLED. THE FOE CHAIN IS OBTAINED FROM */ 02034000
*   /* THE TCB BEING PURGED. FOR EACH FOE ON THE CHAIN, A TEST IS    */ 02035000
*   /* MADE TO ENSURE THAT THE PAGE IS IN CORE. IF NOT IN CORE, THE  */ 02036000
*   /* FIX COUNT IN THE FOE MUST BE ZERO. IF NOT ZERO, AN ERROR HAS  */ 02037000
*   /* OCCURRED AND IS RECORDED BY THE FRR. IF THE PAGE IS NOT IN    */ 02038000
*   /* CORE (ERROR OR NOT), THE FOE IS DEQUEUED FROM TCBFOE AND      */ 02039000
*   /* INSERTED ON THE AVAILABLE QUEUE (RSMFOEQ), AND THE NEXT FOE   */ 02040000
*   /* OBTAINED AND PROCESSED. IF THE PAGE IS IN CORE, THE PFTE IS   */ 02041000
*   /* LOCATED AND A TEST IS MADE TO SEE IF DECREMENTING THE PFTE FIX*/ 02042000
*   /* COUNT BY THE FOE FIX COUNT WILL CAUSE THE PFTE FIX COUNT TO GO*/ 02043000
*   /* NEGATIVE. IF IT WILL, THE PFTE FIX COUNT IS NOT CHANGED, AN   */ 02044000
*   /* ERROR IS RECORDED VIA THE FRR, AND THE FOE IS IS PUT ON THE   */ 02045000
*   /* AVAILABLE QUEUE. OTHERWISE, THE PFTE FIX COUNT IS DECREMENTED */ 02046000
*   /* BY THE FIX COUNT IN THE FOE. IF THE FRAME FIX COUNT IS NOW    */ 02047000
*   /* ZERO, THE LONG FIX FLAG IS TURNED OFF. IN ADDITION, IF        */ 02048000
*   /* DEFERRED RELEASE PROCESSING MUST BE DONE, THE DEFERRED RELEASE*/ 02049000
*   /* ROUTINE IS CALLED TO PROCESS THE UNFIXED PAGE. ON RETURN FROM */ 02050000
*   /* DEFERRED RELEASE, THE RETURN CODE IS CHECKED FOR SUCCESSFUL   */ 02051000
*   /* COMPLETION. IF THE RETURN CODE IS NOT ZERO, AN ERROR IS       */ 02052000
*   /* RECORDED BY THE FRR. WHETHER OR NOT THE FRAME COUNT IS REDUCED*/ 02053000
*   /* TO ZERO, THE FOE IS DEQUEUED FROM THE TCB AND INSERTED ON THE */ 02054000
*   /* AVAILABLE QUEUE (RSMFOEQ). THE NEXT FOE IS OBTAINED AND       */ 02055000
*   /* PROCESSED. WHEN ALL FOES HAVE BEEN PURGED, CONTROL IS RETURNED*/ 02056000
*   /* TO THE MAINLINE.                                              */ 02057000
*   /*                                                               */ 02058000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02059000
*                                                                  0524 02060000
*TERMPFIX:                                                         0524 02061000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               0524 02062000
TERMPFIX DS    0H                                                  0525 02063000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0525 02064000
*    (VSAPTR,                                                      0525 02065000
*     FOEPTR,                                                      0525 02066000
*     PFTEPTR,                                                     0525 02067000
*     R14) RESTRICTED;                                             0525 02068000
*   RMWALVL1=R14;                   /* SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS       */ 02069000
         ST    R14,RMWALVL1(,RMWAPTR)                              0526 02070000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0527 02071000
*    (R14) UNRESTRICTED;                                           0527 02072000
*   FOEPTR=TCBFOEA;                 /* GET THE ADDRESS OF THE FIRST     02073000
*                                      FOE FOR THE TCB BEING PURGED  */ 02074000
         L     @11,RMPLTCBA(,RMPLPTR)                              0528 02075000
         L     FOEPTR,TCBFOEA-1(,@11)                              0528 02076000
         LA    FOEPTR,0(,FOEPTR)                                   0528 02077000
*   TCBFOEA=0;                      /* ZERO THE FOE POINTER.         */ 02078000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0529 02079000
         STCM  @12,7,TCBFOEA(@11)                                  0529 02080000
*FOETEST:                                                          0530 02081000
*   IF FOEPTR=0 THEN                /* TEST FOR END OF FOES TO BE  0530 02082000
*                                      DONE                          */ 02083000
FOETEST  LTR   FOEPTR,FOEPTR                                       0530 02084000
         BZ    @RT00530                                            0530 02085000
*     GOTO EXITPFIX;                /* NO MORE FOES, SO EXIT         */ 02086000
*   VSAPTR=FOEVINDX*256;            /* GET THE VSA OF THE FIXED AREA */ 02087000
         LH    VSAPTR,FOEVINDX(,FOEPTR)                            0532 02088000
         N     VSAPTR,@CF02318                                     0532 02089000
         SLA   VSAPTR,8                                            0532 02090000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0533 02091000
*    (RSAPTR) RESTRICTED;                                          0533 02092000
*   GENERATE CODE                   /* GET THE RBN TO REFERENCE PFTE */ 02093000
*       REFS(VSAPTR) SETS(RSAPTR) FLOWS(MAKERBN);                  0534 02094000
         LRA   RSAPTR,0(0,VSAPTR)  GET THE RSA OF THE VSA               02095000
         BC    8,MAKERBN           IF GOOD RBN, GO PROCESS              02096000
*   IF FOEFXCT¬=0 THEN              /* TEST FOR AN ERROR IN FOE. THE    02097000
*                                      FIX COUNT IN THE FOE MUST BE     02098000
*                                      ZERO OR AN ERROR HAS OCCURRED.*/ 02099000
         LH    @12,FOEFXCT(,FOEPTR)                                0535 02100000
         LTR   @12,@12                                             0535 02101000
         BZ    @RF00535                                            0535 02102000
*     DO;                           /* RECORD THE ERROR              */ 02103000
*       RCARCRD='01'X;              /* SET ERROR REASON CODE         */ 02104000
         L     @12,PVTPRCA(,PVTPTR)                                0537 02105000
         MVI   RCARCRD(@12),X'01'                                  0537 02106000
*       GENERATE CODE SETS(R1);                                    0538 02107000
         ABEND X'C0D',,,SYSTEM      RECORD THE ERROR                    02108000
*     END;                                                         0539 02109000
*   GOTO FREEFOE;                   /* GO FREE THE FOE               */ 02110000
         B     FREEFOE                                             0540 02111000
*MAKERBN:                                                          0541 02112000
*                                                                  0541 02113000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02114000
*   /*                                                               */ 02115000
*   /* THE PAGE IS IN STORAGE. IF THE FOE FIX COUNT IS GREATER THAN  */ 02116000
*   /* THE PFTE FIX COUNT, THERE IS AN ERROR SO RECORD IT. IF NOT,   */ 02117000
